story:
When Byron Prior was a youngster, his life was a living hell thanks to his heartless and greedy mother. Playing With The Devil is a novel based on Byron’s true story of horrid child abuse in all of its forms: physical, mental, emotional, verbal and worst of all – sexual. For obvious reasons, this book is rated ‘R,’ so please do not flag this as inappropriate. What happened then and what continues to happen to this day is just too important to simply dismiss.

While Byron’s father was away as captain of a ship, his mother made ends meet by pimping out her own children to many of Grand Bank, Newfoundland’s most prominent citizens – lawyers, judges, businessmen - even Salvation Army officers. There was also the perverted next-door neighbor, many of the mother’s friends and even other family members like Byron’s own grandfather – all of whom took full advantage of these innocent children.

Byron’s abuse began at the hands of his mother when he was just 4 years old. He was pulled into his mother’s bed at night and told to be nice to the pedophile next door, if he knew what was good for him. When he committed even the most innocent of acts, his hands were put on a burning hot wood stove, he was severely beaten over and over again, and was badly injured from being thrown through the back door and down the rear steps.

If all of that were not enough to endure, he also had to witness the abuse of his younger brothers and sisters. He tried to comfort his siblings when they were beaten by his mother and offered words of hope when they were sexually assaulted by strangers. She often gave them over to sexual liaisons for as little as a loaf of bread or for a gallon or two of gas in her car. On one occasion, Byron washed his 4-year-old sister, who had just been raped by their grandfather and left on the kitchen floor lying in a pool of her own blood.

As the oldest of the 12 children, he always felt the burden of wishing he could somehow help them. Even as a young boy, he sneaked out at night and ran to the police station hoping someone would help – but they never did. As an adult, he went to the Royal Canadian Mounted Police many times -  in 1960, twice in 1962, 1966, 1968, about 1971 and in 1998 during which he gave a 2 1/2 –hour statement. During the 70's, three of his sisters, one brother and a niece, also made reports to the Grand Bank RCMP. One sister was allegedly raped and became pregnant due to a sexual assault by a minister of parliament. Since then, Byron has taken his case to court representing himself, since he could not afford a lawyer. On one occasion, he was committed to a mental facility because he continuously and consistently told the truth about what happened to him and to his siblings.Today, over 50 years later, Byron is still seeking justice for what was done to all of them. As you can see from his photo, he also traveled to Ontario a number of times to protest on Parliament Hill in Ottawa - in a continued effort to draw attention to this major injustice.

I am hoping to raise enough funds for Byron to hire a good lawyer who will seriously represent him and help him find justice once and for all. As well, it is my wish that my book, Playing With The Devil, which I wrote in an effort to get Byron’s message out to the world, will acquire the support of a mainstream publisher.  For a short time, this book was sold through a Calgary publisher but due to changes in the publishing arena over the past few years, she will no longer be representing authors and/or their books. This change has forced me to seek other options. At this time, the book is only available in ebook format on Amazon.com. My wish is to get it back into the hands of a traditional publisher who will care as much as I do about what happened to Byron and his siblings.

Therefore, my funding request is two-fold – money to help Byron launch a strong lawsuit against the perpetrators of these horrible crimes and money to publish this book in hard cover format so his devastating story of abuse can reach more people worldwide. If the funding goal is met, I will provide updates on both my and Byron’s progress on my blog site at https://plus.google.com/105846981608373220977/posts. 

Please Note: Monies raised will be shared 70/30 with Byron receiving the larger amount.

story:
Short Summary

There are some books that engage us at a logical level, yet transport us to deeper, nobler, realms of living. Growing Food God's Way is one of them! 

The very thought of approaching ANY element of our lives and pondering whether God has a better, more natural, way of doing it will transform our future if we grasp the beauty and simplicity of it to live healthier, giving, and more meaningful lives.  We see this lived out in the life of Paul Gautschi. Please invest in his message:  Better Food + Less Work = God's Way

What We Need & What You Get

Your pre-publication book reservations completely bring Paul’s life message to the world in print for the first time! By reserving books, you fast-track its life-enhancing message to you and many others.

For your $17, you will get the 200pp (apx) softcover book with NO SHIPPING cost in the US, Canada, and Puerto Rico. All other destinations, please add $6 US per book. 

We are seeking $7,000 to:

  • secure needed printing/binding equipment & supplies like paper stock and ink;
  • provide needed legal items: ISBNs, Library of Congress, bar codes, copyrights;
  • pay for professional cover design & printing;
  • get a good start on the book’s website: www.growingfoodgodsway.com

The perks are the books themselves. The more you reserve, the lower price you pay. You reserve a book...We make and send you a book.  SIMPLE!

Nearly two years in the making, you get a valuable resource: all the research, photos,  and interviews at your fingertips in about 60 days!


ALL BOOK RESERVERS WILL BE INVITED TO A BOOK PREMIERE EVENT IN WASHINGTON as details come together.   

The Impact

Growing Food God’s Way is a biography of Paul Gautschi. (150,000+ hits on Google) Paul’s garden and orchard are known all over the world, and his message of health, earth stewardship, faith and practice are uber  needed in our day.

Joel Salatin (author of bestselling titles like: Everything I Want to Do Is Illegal, Folks, This Ain’t Normal, and Fields of Farmers) offers a deftly crafted Foreword to the book (and admirable tribute to Paul Gautschi).

Like other new products on Indiegogo, this book is unique and the author will use the funds to supply the product and be a resource to other authors as the funds to Pay It Forward  are gathered and wisely applied.

My name is David Devine and this book is for you IF you care about responsibly growing and eating  nutrient-dense foods with less cost, less hassle, and less stress.

Risks & Challenges

The goal is a bit low, if the worst happens and we do not make goal, we will still move forward with the project because we are committed to supplying the books you reserve. We are also seeking a benefactor who will match the level of Indiegogo funds, thus all the resources would be available to print, bind, and ship to you and yours!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please post or link to this campaign on your blog, Facebook, Google+ and other media.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Summary

After 3 years of working on Love Beyond Life book II on and off, the first draft is finally coming to fruition. Since Angels & Airwaves is releasing a new album this Halloween, I will also be releasing a super rare, limited edition run of the first draft of Love Beyond Life book II and it will be called the Dream Walker edition. It will be a physical book similar to Love Beyond Life book I. The final draft and published edition of book II will not be released until 2.14.2015, so this is your chance to get a look at the book months before it is finalized and released. By participating in this campaign, you will be getting both the Dream Walker edition as well as the finalized edition when complete.

For those of you who are not previously familiar with my work, my name is Jeffrey A Brown. For my honor's thesis project at UMass Dartmouth I wrote an Angels & Airwaves inspired sci-fi novel called Love Beyond Life, back in 2011. In addition to featuring Tom DeLonge and the music of Angels & Airwaves, the book also contained a love story as it explored my scientific hybrid of Psychology and Quantum Physics, which I call Quantum PsychoPhysics. It's a fun read that lead to a book tour back in 2011.

This campaign is very important to me because as a self-published author I try very hard to make my voice heard. I have been blessed over the years with a decent facebook audience and amazon presence. I am trying to stretch myself out even further with this campaign for the sequel to my hit novel, give people an opportunity to get a super-rare, limited run version of this book months before the official version is released and also release some other new merchandise as well.

Contributors will be a part of Love Beyond Life history, and will have an autographed (and numbered) version of the draft novel to show for it!


What We Need & What You Get

The books themselves will be relatively easy to get done money-wise, as I've done self-publishing before and am familiar with the process. However, I do plan on pairing with this Dream Walker edition a new Love Beyond Life t-shirt called the Man On The Moon t-shirt, which the minimum shirts I can get produced is 30, and that will cost $460. story:
What We Need & What You Get

To make this book a reality, I created a budget that will encompass everything that we need.  The funds total to $3,500 and that amount is broken down as follows:

  • Illustrations:  $1,000

  • Printing:  $900

  • Copyright:  $115

  • ISBN # Package:  $295

  • Barcode:  $25

  • Shipping:  $250

  • Layout Design:  $540

  • Wiggle Room:  $400

So far we have raised $500 in our initial fundraising attempt, so we have begun some of the illustrating.  I want to emphasize that the ultimate goal of this project is to show my Mom how awesome she is and to get her writing again, not to make a profit. If we do not reach our intended goal:

  • $3,000: Allow the project to continue, but cut the amount of printed copies in half to 25 books.

  • $2,500: Enough for the project to be completed, but hold off on printing until we have raised more funds.

  • $2,000: Remove the ebook option and hold off page layouts until we raised more funds.

  • $1,500: Fund only the illustrations to her book to be completed, leaving the rest to be completed when we attain further funding.

  • <$1,500: Not enough to illustrate every poem in the book, and require us to put aside certain poems to illustrate for the future.

If we exceed our goal, here is how the project changes:

  • $4,000 - Fund a trip for my Mom to do a book reading in her home state.

  • >$4,000 - Anything raised beyond $4,000 will be used for two things.  25% will be used to donate copies of the book to schools, libraries, and children’s programs.  The other 75% will fund my Mom’s next writing venture.

The Specifics

I have prepared and set into motion every aspect of the project:

  • Printing:  The incredible Craig Howick of World Digital Printing in Beavercreek, Ohio is helping me figure out the details of the physical printing of the book. We have the dimensions, paper type, quantity, and price all worked out and ready to go.

  • Layout:  The amazing Ego Faylona, a close friend and the Art Director of a start-up, will lay out the pages for the ebook and hard copy so that everything is perfect.  He also created the video above.  To see more of his work, check out his website.

  • Illustration:  The unbelievably talented Megan Wall, a great friend and fellow Bobcat, will be the mastermind behind all things illustrated for our book.  She has helped me create a unique style for the illustrations and has made some amazing watercolor images.  To see more of her work, check out her website.

  • Execution:  I, Kristin Fugitt, will manage  all shipments and details associated with the remaining tasks in publishing this book.  To learn more about me, visit my website.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, we still appreciate your support!  Here is how you can help:

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family.

  • Send my Mom a letter or email!  Express your admiration for her work so that she will continue to create.  12210 Stirrup Cup Lane  Rockville, VA 23146  or  susiefugitt@yahoo.com

story:
Our Story

This May our 3 year old daughter Theolyn was diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder. As you can imagine this came as quite a shock to us and has remained extremely challenging as we have progressed through months of testing, evaluations and now physical, occupational, and speech therapies. Our friends and family have reached out to us and asked how they can help, and until now we've struggled to find a way that people could provide any aid because of how specific her needs are .


The one thing we keep noticing is that most people don't really know what Autism is. And honestly we were not that aware of the broad spectrum of this disability. ASD manifests itself most strikingly as impairments in communication and in the formation of social relationships. Children with Autism are often nonverbal, or when they are verbal like Theolyn, they usually do not use the skill to actively communicate with other people in their environment. This significantly delays her development and education. Many children with this disability have a strong need for a structured, routine environment; change creates feelings of fear and/or anxiety. This holds very true for our daughter.

Another behavior common to Autism is a tendency to wander away. Parents often refer to their children as “Houdini,” stating they are able to escape from even the most secured environment and the family usually has multiple locks on every door and window in the home. When this happens, the child may be in a life-threatening situation, especially if they are already out of the physical sight of their caregiver. Theolyn is very much in this category. We have been blessed so far that she cannot open doors with locks yet, but we know that is coming soon.

Children with Autism often don’t respond to their names consistently, if they respond at all. They rarely understand the many dangers in their environment; an approaching car, a stranger with ill intentions, or an aggressive dog. One of our greatest fears is that Theolyn will go missing, or that we might look away only for a minute and turn to find her gone or darting out into the path of an oncoming car. We face this every day with Theolyn. If we are at a park she runs directly away from us and will not respond to her name. We pretty much still carry her everywhere because of this behavior. 


No one knows exactly what causes Autism but the children often appear to live in a world we have little understanding of. Often they participate in ritualistic and repetitive behaviors, sometimes for hours at a time.  Theolyn tends to walk/run in circles continuously, flap her hands, and makes any type of doll or toy "go to sleep".


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to provide an Autism Spectrum Disorder service dog for Theolyn. These service dogs are trained to deal with all of the behaviors mentioned above. An ASD service dog will stay with the child and contain her in a specified area. If the child does get away, the dog is trained in search and rescue. It will quickly lead the adult to the child even if she has been missing for quite some time. These dogs are also trained to disrupt the stimulation behaviors such as hand flapping or walking in circles. One of the most critical things is how these dogs help a child socially. They bond with the child and they tend to bring out social behaviors that are typically missing. Service dogs also promote social interaction with others as many people will want to interact with the dog and Theolyn.

This training does not come cheap. Months of training, housing, and veterinary care are invested in each dog. The full cost to train an ASD service dog is $15,000. We are looking to send our brand new Golden Retriever puppy, Winston(pictured below), through this training program. He will be evaluated within the next few weeks to determine if he meets the temperament requirements of the training program. 


If we get the go ahead he will be boarded in the training program for 9 to 12 months. If he is not able to be trained, we will get a service dog for Theolyn that has already been through the program. This is the trainer we will be using not too far from us in Maryville, TN.  http://www.wilderwood.org. And this is a video describing the training process. http://wilderwood.org/autism/autism_dogs_video.html.

If we don't reach our entire goal of fundraising we will use what is provided and attempt to fund the rest ourselves.

Our fundraisers will receive the joy of knowing that they have helped a very sweet and special girl face the challenges of ASD. We will provide updates with pictures and videos. And anyone is welcome to come visit Theolyn and meet her service dog.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please pass this along your friends and families.
  • You can share this through the Facebook, Twitter, and email buttons above.

Thank You Everyone!!!

story:
I’m headed to El Salvador from January 25-February 5 as an international elections observer with the Committee in Solidarity with the People of El Salvador (CISPES), an amazing non-profit that has been supporting social movements and challenging unjust US foreign and economic policies in Central America for over 30 years. We’ll be monitoring the first presidential elections in El Salvador since the people ended decades of rightwing rule in 2009. This is an incredible opportunity, not only to play a role in preventing rightwing fraud and possible US intervention, but to see firsthand the changes that have been possible in just a few short years since their first-ever progressive government took office. I hope to bring back powerful stories of the people and communities who are building grassroots solutions to the problems they face, both to inspire our movements here in the US and to build cross-border connections between us as we work toward the same goal: to create a better world for all.

I'm asking for your support for travel and in country costs of the delegation. Can you join with me in standing in solidarity with the alternative vision of the Salvadoran people? Many, many thanks. Peace and blessing to you, Eddie

story:
My name is Treesh and I have spent the last 7 years exploring the world through two mediums: food and adventure. I believe in building a voice for food and adventure as a means of preventative health, and building my blog as a media outlet for those passionate for their personal health and the outdoors. By contributing to my campaign, you can help me build a movement for an arguably sport-centric community, building a connection between what is good for the environment and our bodies, while sharing stories about exploration and new experiences. 

  • Funds will go directly towards building new stories and recipes. In the event that I do not reach my entire goal, funds will go towards ingredients for recipe exploration, meeting with community members to build "Eat Like an Athlete" guest posts, and more local travel to explore the connection between food, getting outside, happiness, and personal growth.
  • If fully funded, funds will go towards travel to a new part of the world in exploration of climbing, food, and how athletes behave and feed themselves.

The Impact

I want to humanize athletes, and to bring out the athlete and explorer in all people. I want to build access to good food, exploration and the outdoors to a more diverse group of people by making it look less intimidating, and by telling stories from real people. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Money isn't the only way to build this mission, but sharing stories and recipes is. Please check out the blog at www.summitsustenance.com - spread the word!

story:
With so many urgent struggles taking place around the world, Indigenous Peoples are counting on us for our support.  The world's media only covers the occasional skirmish or event, where we provide comprehensive reporting on the Indigenous Peoples Movement in a timely, accurate and insightful way. What's more, IC alone examines the dynamics of the movement and the concepts critical to its success. Without IC, educators, organizers and activists would be operating in a vacuum of essential information and insight.

If you think there's some value in that, please help us to continue, strengthen and expand all facets of our work.



Short Summary

With the ceaseless struggles of more than 500 Indigenous Nations around the world, there's certainly no shortage of stories that need to be told, voices that need to be heard, histories that need to be revealed, struggles that urgently need your support.

I founded IC Magazine nearly ten years ago for these very reasons. I wanted to create a free and open space where people could learn about the struggles and challenges that face the Ngobe Bugle, the Penan, the Havasupai, the Mikmaq, the Maasai and all other Indigenous Peoples and Nations around the world.

Today, IC is one of the most prominent volunteer-run online magazines of its kind. We've published close to 3000 articles, highlighted over 700 videos and films, and compiled dozens of monthly briefings. We also publish two annual print magazines and produce the occasional  documentary film.

Now, with your help, we're going to take our work to the next level.

What We Need & What You Get

Our long term plan is to expand investigative journalism at IC so that we can start carrying out in depth investigations of situations that are suffering from a media blackout,  like China's forced settlement of 1.5 million nomads, and the ongoing uranium mining waste disaster in Jadugoda, India. We also want to bring our premier annual magazine, People Land Truth, to universities and bookstores across North America. As well, we want to pay writers for their work, hire a small staff and increase our news flow at least threefold.

This really isn't about us, though. It's about informing, educating, inspiring, even challenging the international community and making sure there's at least one source of independent news that covers the struggles, needs, rights, opinions and perspectives of all the world's bedrock nations.

As an added incentive,  we have a tonne of amazing stuff to give away, including  IC stickers, shirts, posters, and a selection of our magazines in print and ebook format.

Our friends from the Dub Collective IR (Indigenous Resistance) have also kindly given us a couple handfuls of their 25th album, Dubversive, a sampling of which you can find here.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have any money but sill want to lend a hand with our campaign, you can help us spread the word! Tell your friends and colleagues,  link to our campaign on Facebook and twitter,  or make a blog post somewhere! Anything you can do get the word out would be most appreciated.

story:
Our Story

My name is Ashley-Jayne Osborn, and I have some friends in an awesome band called SLEEPER/AGENT. We met for the first time in April of 2011, when I interviewed them as an aspiring music journalist. I proceeded to, as usual, write about the experience on my website. I didn't expect a significant friendship to form with SLEEPER/AGENT, but we did just that. We've been thick as thieves ever since. 


Now, in an effort to further my journalism career, I have the wonderful opportunity to join the gang on tour this fall for anywhere from a month to two months. This has been a dream of mine since I was thirteen years old and I am really looking forward to showing the world a side they don't see! However, I cannot do it alone. It is for this reason that I am reaching out to you, dear reader and friend. Read more about this project after the jump!


DISCLAIMER: SLEEPER/AGENT has been generous enough to donate a few items for this cause, but please be aware that this project is all mine. I am in charge of everything that occurs. Apart from joining the band on tour and the ways that they have offered to help, they aren't involved in any other part of this project. None of this money goes to them, only to me. Should you have any issues with anything, please contact me (ashley.jayne@yahoo.com) and not the band. Thank you! 


________________________________


*IF YOU DONATE $5 OR MORE PLEASE COMMENT AND LET US KNOW YOUR WEBSITE/TUMBLR/TWITTER/FACEBOOK/ETC THAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO BE LINKED TO ON THE BLOG! 


** PLEASE ALSO FREQUENTLY CHECK THE 'UPDATES' TAB AT THE TOP, AS WE ARE GRADUALLY MAKING PRIZE CHANGES SO THERE ARE MORE GUARANTEES AND ENTICEMENTS FOR YOU!


____________________________


The Impact

Essentially, the focus of my project is to be able to show the public the tour life of a band that is currently working hard to become as famous as many of us dream to be when we are children. (Not to mention, any other bands that join us on the tour, which could also be musicians of considerable fame).  The band, however, has to do something different.  They move onto the next town, a new hotel, new people and new experiences. They get a clean slate every night.

This one tour will never happen again, and, if things continue to go the way they have been for SLEEPER/AGENTâ€¦ their tour life may never be quite so humble again; They could become more and more privileged. Something to capture my perspective and experiences in ways other than my fluid blog entries and unleash my creativity. If I don't meet my entire goal, chances are, I won't be able to go on this tour... or will not be very comfortable throughout it. What money is not used for personal expenses will go into putting together the book or film. 

Of course, you receive prizes too, my friends! :) I could never leave those out. (See Perks).

If you cannot donate, it would mean the world to me if you encouraged others you know to do so! Please know, however, that every dollar counts. By small and simple things, great things come to pass... and I recognize that fully! I am so grateful for every ounce of support and hope to repay you well.

story:
Greetings, my name is Kifani Doulos Thompson and I am an indie author. I published my first book, Not Ashamed - The Path to Total Surrender, a few years ago. It was a great experience and I learned a lot. I have been married for 17 years and my wife and I have four children.
 
I'm trying to raise money to properly package and promote this book. What I learned from “Not Ashamed” is that a good manuscript will only get you so far. It is vital to have an excellent brand with marketing and promotion. I am passionate about the "Make Them Earn It Book and System”, because I have seen firsthand the change in me as a parent and in my children. I want to make it available to families so they can learn skills and techniques to produce happy, well-adjusted families.
 
I believe a proverb that says people perish from lack of knowledge. We are suffering generation after generation from lack of parenting knowledge. My own family suffered before it was transformed by "Making Them Earn It." I would like to share it with the masses and to do that I need your help.
 
We hope to raise $5000 or more to seed this project. We want to get it properly edited, branded, and promoted so people can be blessed. We believe that this book and system can really help many families.
 
Our budget is as follows:
$1,200 for Professional Editor
$500 for Professional Typeset
$1,000 for Professional Branding
$1,300 for Professional Promotional Materials
$1000 for online promotion 
 
The beauty with the self-publisher, createspace, is that I have one price for books either 1 or 1000 and Direct Physical Distribution through Amazon.com. If we don't reach $5,000 "Make Them Earn It" will happen, we just will have a taller mountain to climb.
 
I know this is my vision and I'm one of many people saying, "Hey, can you help me get my vision out." I totally understand that everyone has responsibilities and commitments, so if you can't or don't want to support that's cool, I just thank you for taking the time to read this.
 
If you do decide to contribute you will be doing more than helping me get a book out. The truth is that in March 2013 I was diagnosed with a genetic heart condition. I am scheduled to return to work on August 15, 2013 and I'm not sure how long I will last there. I honestly now have a great struggle with noise and commotion. So I'm trying to get the transition in motion now so my health does not decline further.
 
I think the key to great communities is the families in the communities. Parenting is something that is learned on the job. We want to equip parents to be able to raise healthy and well-adjusted children.
 
If you can't help financially, if you could pray and share this campaign it would be wonderful. Trust me if I could fund it myself I would. I'm going to be working hard every day, striving to birth "Make Them Earn It," any help you can be would make me eternally grateful.
 
I am a transparent person. If you want more details you can email me and we can talk. That's all for now, time to get back to working on bringing "Make Them Earn It" to life!

story:
INTRODUCTION:
What if I told you I was a mermaid? Or Tinkerbell's best friend? Or what if I told you that I've been to Narnia? Rode on Unicorns and met Leprechauns? In my reading, I've done all this and more. My imagination broadened, deepened and soared, and now I believe that the gift of imagination, can stir the heart to greatness. My desire as an author is to inspire young and old hearts alike with the whimsy and glory of innocence. I want to create backdrops that accompany the heart on it's journey, and spur it to deeper understanding. I believe "Free As A Leelee Bird" does just that. Through it's imaginative beauty, I guarantee you, it will inspire you to choose freedom for your own heart. With your help, I can print this book and start on the sequel. Thank you!


FUNDING PLAN:
1. I plan on printing a minimum of 300 hardcover books.
2. I need to purchase an ISBN, as well as pay someone to format the book for print.
3. There are shipping costs to get all the books here, and then out to you.
4. There are some additional costs for the "perks" section.
5. Indiegogo takes 9% of my funds if I don't raise my goal, and only 4% if I do.

-If I surpass my goal, I will use the additional funds for my next book, that I'm working on presently. 
-If I do not meet my goal, I will have to print less books, or downsize the quality of the book.


VALUE OF THIS BOOK:
The feedback I've received already (see Amazon Reviews) has been outstanding! It has captivated the imaginations of little girls and boys, teaching them how to steward their hearts in the midst of offense. Through this enchanting story, the heart opens up to see the real PERK of forgiveness and why we want to extend that. I am a singer/songwriter and have offered not just this book, but music birthed from my heart as well, (Band Of A Thousand) in the PERKS section. I've also built up a business these last five years called New Creation Blocks, and have offered a product there as an incentive too. I'm pulling from all my talents to make this book happen in print. :)

HOW YOU CAN HELP:

If you would like to help me reach my goal, I'd be honored if you'd share this campaign with your friends. You'll find links to do just that on this page. If you want to pre-order or give to this campaign in any way, I'd be incredibly grateful. I appreciate so much your time, your feedback, and your support. With much love, Aimee Perry.

story:
Rainbow Tales Publishing is my dream - my dream of publishing not only my books, but helping others fulfill the same dream.

It takes a village to raise a child and I'm discovering it can also take a village to make a dream come true.

Finances are tight for many of us, which makes doing something right more difficult than taking shortcuts. I refuse to take shortcuts when it comes to the integrity of my novels. I've hired a professional cover artist, professional editors, and professional formatters. 

My first novel, Out of the Past, has been through the rigors of each of the professionals and should be ready for release by December 31. My novel, Welcome Home, will be ready to go to beta readers and the professional editors after the first of the year and hopefully be ready for release by the end of March. But that won't happen if I'm unable to raise the necessary funds to pay my professional team.

I am offering some nice perks in exchange for your monetary help to fund my dream. I am offering everything from naming a character in my next book (at all giving levels) to a copy of each of my next five novels (at the highest giving level). Each person giving any amount will also receive an autographed postcard featuring the covers of my current books and mention on my website in my "Hall of Fame."

I appreciate any and all help, no matter how small, you can give me. I need to try to raise approximately $3000 to be able to publish my next two to three novels and have a pillow of comfort in case of unforeseen circumstances.

 

Thank you for reading and for donating.

story:
The Plunge of Icarus

The inaugural CineNovel®
CineNovel®, (a trademarked company) has been formed to create a new genre of illustrated storybooks for the burgeoning e-book market and computer-capable e-readers, as well as publishing a line of unique, high-quality coffee table books in traditional print.

CineNovel® represents a new faucet and direction for the graphic novel, utilizing actors, props, sets, wardrobe, and still photography (much like shooting a film), and marrying the still frames to a full literary manuscript with dynamic graphics for a thoroughly unique visual reading experience.

The Story

The Plunge of Icarus is a highly imaginative futuristic story set on the isle of Crete in the Mediterranean Sea. Mount Olympus has been resurrected, built into an omnipotent air force power, lording its dominance over the Earth in a strange, never explained war. The pilots that make up this force have been raised since birth to believe they are the new Greek gods, taking their names from the pages of the Greek Myths. Each day they take their supersonic planes into endless sorties over nameless targets in the north, doing battle with an equally nameless enemy, never questioning what it is they do.

Icarus is Olympus’ top flier. A fearless, emotionless, dutiful fighter pilot who never questions his actions – until one day when he comes face to face with the never before seen enemy. The experience sends him into a tailspin of confusion and sets him on a course of discovery, for the truth behind Mount Olympus’ global intentions, as well as his own emotional saneness.

The Plunge of Icarus is an insightful story about life, death, and war – wrapped inside an unexpected romance, as Icarus finds love with the beautiful Adrasteia (The “inescapable one”), one of the nymphs of the island.

Warning: This project contains mature themes and is intended for a mature audience.

The Production

Principal photography has been completed on The Plunge of Icarus and we are currently in post-production, compositing the images and creating CGI.

For The Plunge of Icarus we shot green screen on-stage in Hollywood, with background plates shot at various locations, including the Frank Loyd Wright/Ennis House and (due to a rare US Air Force endorsement) Edwards Air Force Base.

The Platform

This is a major independent publishing effort, intended for a global market, set to be a major game-changer in the rapidly evolving e-reader market. Starting a publishing company and being able to produce this unique work as a finely printed coffee table book and adapt it for e-readers is an expensive undertaking. CineNovel® is intent on remaining totally independent and to complete this project with the quality it deserves and in a fashion that will ensure the emergence of a unique brand.

This is a rare opportunity to be involved with the nucleus of a new genre of storytelling while perpetuating the spirit of independence in an increasingly corporate landscape.

story:
Story of My Book

The Purpose Cycle: Unlock the Secrets to Success is a tool to help improve your life by embarking on a self-improvement journey through five key stages.

My name is Jonathon Tucker and I am the author of The Purpose Cycle. I wrote this book because as a teacher, I love to inspire people every single day. I see how words, thoughts, ideas and dreams mould the person that we become. But is it ever too late to find a new aspiration? Can you become even more successful than you already are?

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover your Purpose. In this book, I hope to instil in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the everlasting journey of self-improvement. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you supersede your wildest dreams, and sit there in your elder years reflecting on everything that you’ve accomplished, rather than disdainfully look back on all what could’ve been.

In this book, you'll learn about manifesting and realising your goals. You'll hear stories such as...
  • my journey to find purpose across three timelines in my life
  • how to think internally to acknowledge your weaknesses and turn them into strengths
  • how others found their purpose through the most difficult situations in their lives
You will love this book if you love to study personal development, aspire to become your greatest self, and you want to become fulfilled with your dream life.

The Purpose Cycle is a nonfiction book that speaks to young professionals and aspiring people who want to look at their purpose and their careers in a new way.
 

The Book - The Purpose Cycle: Unlock the secrets to success


The book is written in 5 parts:

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters all about Aspiration. This section looks at how people begin to dream onto bigger things in life. How are aspirations formed? Are certain goals more morally acceptable than others? Is ‘spite’ a negative way to channel your aspirations to do better? This section focuses on how to aspire out of both positive and negative situations, and understanding that things happen ‘for’ us, not ‘to’ us.

Part 2 contains chapters about Realisation, the second stage of The Purpose Cycle. Realisation is about looking internally to find your true self. We always present a framed version of ourselves to the people we spend time with, some may be closer to your true self than others. The realisation phase explores how your past experiences and upbringing has shaped you, and uncovers some home truths that will stand you in good stead to move on, and truly develop as a person.

Part 3 contains chapters about Initiation. The hardest step in any journey is the first one. This section helps readers take the leap of faith with a series of stories, analysis and tasks designed to rid you of the impostor syndrome, the ‘what if?’ questions apart from one - What if you didn’t take this opportunity? What if you’re sat at the end of your life regretting everything that you didn’t try?

Part 4 contains chapters about Creation. This is the day to day life that you want to create for yourself. To realise a dream, you have to life in that reality first. Each day you spend becoming your future self, you must cast votes for what it is you want to become. This section highlights the various choices that you must make on the road to success.

Part 5 contains chapters about the final step of The Purpose Cycle: Fruition. Over weeks, months and years of consistency your hard work pays off. They say that you reap what you sow, and this applies to life. Once you bask in your accomplishments, a new fire ignites: the next aspiration, a new Purpose Cycle.

story:
Story of My Book

Hidden Threads is a collection of non-fiction essays exploring beyond the black and white views of key technology, business and political issues.

My name is Chris Hsiang and I am the author of Hidden Threads. I wrote this book because I care about the big systemic problems we face in society today (like climate change, wealth inequality and discrimination) and I crave more meaningful conversations for all of us instead of the arguing and name-calling. I believe that by examining how we form our beliefs and understanding more about systems, we will be better able to address these problems as leaders and as individuals in our society.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will have a deeper understanding of the power, wonder and the flaws of our current systems. I hope to inspire a renewed appreciation of questions, not just as a tool to get information but as a way to engage people and to excavate your own and others' beliefs. I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for unraveling difficult topics. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you have meaningful conversations on topics around social change and get past the black and white thinking about important issues we face today.

Some fun topics I explore include:

  • How fiction/stories fill a void and impact our reality
  • The illusions created by the overflow of information
  • Our economy of desire

 

Some questions I tackle include:

  • How do we create a shared vision of the greater good in a diverse and complex society? How do we find a mutual purpose?
  • If agreement of a majority is not enough for peace in a nation, what will be enough?
  • How do we get our ideas of who the typical American is? The typical Texan? The typical Chinese? The typical Middle Easterner?

 

You will love this book if you want to move past black and white thinking in our social and political dialogue, if you want to dive deeper into the systemic problems we face, or if you are someone that loves exploring big ideas about humanity.

Hidden Threads is a nonfiction book that speaks to leaders who want new perspective on our systemic problems and people who want to engage more deeply with each other about social, political, tech, business topics and explore our humanity in a new way.

 

The Book - Hidden Threads


The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 dives into how our information, our perceptions and beliefs are tied together. The availability and overflow of information has created their own illusions. Facts are understood not in a vacuum but within a larger context. Much of that context consist of our beliefs and stories. We explore the role of information in our beliefs.

Part 2 is a view of our world as systems upon systems. I explore how systems thinking is necessary for our social evolution and to help us untangle the systemic problems we face. I also take a look at technology’s role in systems and how technology has both the power to disrupt or to cement systems further. 

Part 3 shines the light on our society. I highlight some conversations we need to be having at all levels from what it means to be a majority, the responsibility of power, and how we should explore further how we as individuals fit into the collective community. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

Chris(tina) Hsiang is the founder of Panorama Growth and also a corporate attorney at Carr & Ferrell LLP in Silicon Valley. As a corporate attorney, Chris advises tech entrepreneurs,  venture capital investors, and corporate venture investors on tech investments, mergers & acquisitions and intellectual property transactions. Chris also founded Panorama Growth with the mission to connect the tech innovation community in Silicon Valley with that of Asia because she believes that the collaboration of these cultures, talents and resources will greatly benefit our world.

Chris hopes to popularize systems thinking so that all of us can better unravel the systemic problems that threaten our ability to thrive. In Hidden Threads, Chris hopes to use questions to inspire more curiosity and deeper conversations about our world.

When Chris is not at work or engrossed in a science fiction novel, she enjoys propagating all sizes and shapes of succulents, growing abnormally sized vegetables and tending her garden.

For more information, you can connect with Chris Hsiang at connect@panoramagrowth.com and @ChHsiang on Twitter and @Christina.Hsiang on Facebook.
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Use this form https://forms.gle/yC7PBptTwmywoJmx5 to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days).

Here's how:

  • At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: Please don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)
  • Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  • When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry! 
  • Please use #HiddenThreads and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag: #HiddenThreads
LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/christinahsiang
Facebook - @Christina.hsiang/ @NewDegreePress 
Twitter - @ChHsiang/ @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Chris Hsiang

story:
English Major Goes Galactic

One day, I decided to "take a gap year" from uni and work on a farm. During the transition in 2011, I began channeling. Thinking it was angels from the Spirit World, would you know the communicators look like ETs!

My mission is to transmit energy dynamics, teach esoteric knowledge and help starseeds on Earth release terror involving extraterrestrial and/or human contact.

The free online channelings are helping make sense of The Shift, every month, the past eight years.

Dozens of traditional publishers (from local houses to the esoteric society at the UN) have rejected the idea that sovereign, ninja-turtle-like beings exist! However, the clairvoyants in the room see them holographically floating above my head.

I have spent hundreds of hard-earned dollars sending proposals and getting rejected over and over. Local crystal shops won't even look at self-published material as they prefer to sell popular, pre-approved New Age material. My stuff is next level underground!

Healers see that it is in my soul contract to teach others giving these transmissions to our planet Earth and I need to do my cosmic job.

Help support these benevolent Ascension guides! 64% of Americans already believe in extraterrestrial life, so let's go deeper into their teachings.

We can figure out why they are communicating Ancient Egyptian symbols and words. The Andromedan symbols channeled in 2014 were on a sarcophagus at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, NYC, in 2018! Let's open our third eye more and learn what a wavelength pulse is and configure some energy science!

 

By Purchasing the Perk, You Get a Signed Book!

To create this text, which usually takes 8 months, here's what is needed to get it to you faster:

  • $1000 to pay the artist for the excellent quality cover artwork
  • $2000 to transcribe 4 years worth of channeled material to keep readers up-to-date
  • $500 to edit the language of approximately 300 pages/margins/front-back-spine, create a glossary, create an alphabetized index, introduction, rights pages and so on
  • $1500+ to order and check the proof, then order book copies, pay for the shipping materials & handling of the books, sign them individually and ship to each happy customer worldwide

 

How You Are Helping

When you join the list of contributors, you're building the Orion Council tribe.

You're grounding in the third book of a timeless channeling series to the planet, kind of like how Jane Roberts channeled The Seth Material and Carla Rueckert made The Ra Material.

This is the Orion Council Material, where people get to study occult wisdom from the comfort of their own home, at their own unique pace.

In typing up the transcription, my palm chakras light up and tend to get hot. This is why the OC calls these books, "books of light." People can feel their energy through the pages.

As the following grows, who knows, maybe we'll be like Abraham and channel together on a cruise ship. This is still the beginning! Bashar fans KNOW!

 

Risks & Challenges

My typing speed is super fast, but there are some risks involved. In 2014, I began getting carpal tunnel symptoms and had to use a handbrace, while getting attacked by internet misogynists.

Since then, I've discovered organic sulfur which helped remove 90% of bodily symptoms and made some mind-altering rap songs, but it doesn't prevent skeptics, The Cabal or trolls from trying their best.

I also work on the side by running an online school and create handmade wellness/art products for my shop, so time is limited.

To keep the channelings going, I have to create free videos every week without benefactors, etc.

With your help, this becomes seamless and fantastic.

You guys are my Krista's Angels. YOU are disclosure.

I believe in us. Let's keep the contact going.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Short Summary

I'm Remso, and this isn't my first rodeo:

  • My first book "Stay Away From the Libertarians!" was an Amazon bestseller and received rave reviews at Lone Conservative, the Daily Wire, and Students For Liberty.
  • My podcast has earned over half a million downloads and maintains a five-star average on iTunes, as well as being a former 2017 Podcast Awards nominee for best in news and politics.
  • My public access TV show "The Witching Hour" won "best non-fiction series" at the 2019 Indie Series Awards in its first season.

I have the talent, skill, and know-how experience to get the job done!

What We Need & What You Get

Right now to make "How to Succeed in Politics (and Other Forms of Devil Worship)" happen the best way possible I need some help from you!

  • As a successful self-published author, I need to pay for editing, cover art, formatting, and marketing. 
  • As a supporter of this campaign, you'll receive an early signed copy of the book as well as other perks and gifts as a thank you for your support such as bookmarks, posters, and even your name included in the Acknowledgements section!
  • If our goal is not reached, that is alright because all funds raised will still go to publishing efforts and all perks will be honored.

The Impact

With your help, I will be able to:

  • Make this book the highest quality item it can be, as well as move the projected publishing date from March 2020 to December 2019
  • My first bestselling first book, as well as my successful podcast and award-winning documentary series,  were all done on a shoestring budget, so I know how to stretch a dollar and make every penny count!
  • Books are a cherished gift you can hold in your hand, making you in essence part of the story. Now, you have the chance to be part of something people around the world may fall in love with and have you to thank for it becoming a reality.

Risks & Challenges

The challenge is time, and the more financial responsibility I alone bare means it'll take me longer to work for this to become something people can enjoy sooner.

  • I paid 100% of publishing costs for the first book, which took two years to complete from writing to publishing.
  • I work with a team of experts who will need to be paid promptly in order to keep working.

story:
Story of My Book

 

Freedom In Credit Cards: What is credit, why you need it, and how to use it. This book will teach you how to start building your credit the right way. Learn what it takes to set yourself up for financial freedom and enjoy all the benefits an excellent credit and the correct cards have to offer.

My name is Lucciano Diaz-Skoff, and I am the author of Freedom In Credit Cards. My fascination to debunk the best practices to build and restore credit started with a harsh “NO,” and getting denied by my local bank for my first mortgage.
Everything began when I headed to the bank with the hopes of buying my own place to call home and then getting rejected due to my credit score or rather the absence of it.

I wrote this book because of a lack of education and misconceptions around credit and credit cards.

After years of hard work and saving up for this moment, a simple “No” destroyed my dreams of achieving this milestone. That is why I sat down with my new goal of learning all I can about credit to not go throughout this again.

In this journey of learning and recollecting important information, the more people I met up with and talked about credit, the more I realized that this is not a topic people want to talk about. They are just not used to talking about their financial situation openly. Furthermore, we only begin to learn about credit when taking out a loan or through our parents when they give you a credit card, which is not a great source of information. Although, the one thing that people do not tell you is that your credit cards, especially your credit, are tools that can open up a world of possibilities. These opportunities are usually not available to you with cash.

In reading this book, you will discover how to build your credit the right way and take advantage of all the perks and features of credit cards. I hope to instill within you the same passion and excitement that I have for credit and credit cards. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as the best tool to help you start your financial freedom journey.

In this book, you’ll learn about what credit is and how we use it nowadays:

  • How credit has evolved through time, and how it impacts our life now
  • How to start building credit and get approved for your first FOUR (4) credit cards
  • How credit works and how you can begin your journey to financial freedom

You will love this book if you are building your credit, or you already have experience with credit cards and want to learn something new.
Freedom In Credit Cards is a non-fiction book that speaks to those looking to start building credit and are going to be first time users of credit cards. And to those card holders who already have experience, I hope you can learn new information and access insights on how to get their next card.

 

The Book - Freedom in Credit Cards


The book is written in nine parts...

In the introduction, you will find my personal story of how I got denied the chance of buying a home, and how that changed the way I view credit. You will also read about the emotions associated with money and credit cards. Throughout the book, you will learn about the hidden scripts and misconceptions that surround credit cards.

In chapter one, you will learn about the credit card game. What is the game, what are the rules of the game, and how do you play it to WIN. You will also learn about how to manage your credit score, and all the variables it entails.

In chapter two, you will learn what credit is, when it started, and how we use it today. Lastly, we will go over the steps to start building credit the right way!

In chapter three, I will share three things with you. We’ll start by learning how to get approved for your FIRST (1st) credit card.
After you’ve achieved this, we’ll go over how to set yourself up for your SECOND (2nd) credit card! We’ll then finish by diving into the insights of how your credit score fluctuates each time you obtain a new card.

Once you get your second card, chapter four will teach you how to choose your third and fourth card. Furthermore, you will have the tools and knowledge to keep building your credit.

In chapter five, you will learn things not commonly known for credit cards. An example of this is how a loan, a mortgage, and buying a car affects your credit score differently. You will also learn how paying off debt, like student loans, impact your credit score directly.

Chapter six will talk about credit cards for business. How they work, how to get them, and how they can be a tool of growth for you and your business. You will also learn how they differ from personal credit cards and the types of enterprises that can apply to them.

Chapter seven will teach you how to negotiate with banks. You will learn about the things you can and should negotiate directly with your bank and how to do it. You will also find examples of scripts for disputing a late payment or a hard inquiry.

Financial Freedom. The last chapter will discuss the tools you have gained and what you have learned while setting yourself up for your financial freedom, starting with your credit cards.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go toward the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020
  • The Cover Design of my book - the mockups you see currently are placeholders!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for my book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book ($5,000), I will publish.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book ($6,000), I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book ($8,000+), I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook!


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now.

  • A personally signed copy of my book
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experience of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author


I wrote this book due to my passion for credit and credit cards, impacting the lives of current and future credit card users. I believe in the power credit has and how it can help us achieve our financial freedom.

My name is Lucciano Diaz-Skoff. I am an avid inventor and quirky engineer; this means I love my beard. I am also an entrepreneur, and I’ve built things that improve & optimize the lives of those around me.

At 21 years of age, I founded with my brother, the first youth-led nonprofit organization for aspiring entrepreneurs in Puerto Rico. At 23, I led a team of engineers to build a solar-powered car and race it across Texas. When I turned 25, I led a team of first responders and volunteers to gather last-mile intelligence from all 78 Mayors, post-Hurricane Maria. At age 26, I filed my first patent. By 27, I was a patent holder. Now at 28, I’m publishing Freedom In Credit Cards.

When not hard at work, I enjoy drawing and designing new products and solutions for everyday use. I am also passionate about supporting small and medium businesses with a local non-profit foundation and starting new ventures. I make time to read, learn, teach, and explore new ideas and concepts of personal finance and financial freedom.

For more information, you can connect with Lucciano at Luccianodiazskoff@gmail.com, and Lucciano Diaz-Skoff at Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #FreedomInCreditCards and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Lucciano Diaz-Skoff

story:
The Pitch

Books that inspires adventure, curiosity, and conservation through an intelligent, knowledgeable, and loveable guide...demand more from your children's books, demand more from your travel books.

Why Ricky's adventures are more engaging than a honey craving bear or an English wizard or an automobile association rating:

- Magical adventures in real places: Great photos, witty commentary

- A little knowledge: fun facts and challenging vocabulary (in a good way)

- Genuine advice from an experienced traveler (send Ricky an email and get feedback from his travels, really)

 Whatever direction and magnitude you foresee Ricky following, multiply that by 10, square it, and apply that vector to every direction...Ricky's interests and passion for travel fall somewhere between "Epic" and "Legendary", so help him along since something great could be in the near future.

 

Background

A running joke between two friends (getting the best Ricky pictures) turned into a way to stay close when one of the friends got seriously sick. During Ricky's travels, his story resonated with families, seniors, and veterans; something about a little raccoon making the most of the big world attracted their attention and led them to share their own stories. When Ricky's "solo" adventures were immortalized on paper as a "get well" present, he also attracted the attention of the neighborhood kids...that's when the light bulb went off.

 

What We Need

This campaign is to help a small company make the big leap from the digital world to real, tangible media. Realizing that kids do not interact with iPads the way they do with real books, we realized we had to make a big leap (and that's where you come in). The money raised in this campaign will be used to support the following activities:

  1. Ebook to real book - Work with the Publish on Demand services to transition from the current iBook format to real, paperback media...to make something real
  2. Distribution - Even the greatest idea is meaningless if no one knows about it, so marketing and distributing the book will be the next step after publication
  3. Website - Ricky's got wisdom and style, but that takes money to translate into a website. On this budget, it will still be a modest website for certain, but better than what we could learn in a reasonable amount of time

 

The Impact

A few inspired, hard-working people can only take a project so far. Nights/weekends freely given, monetary investments of what we could...but that's not quite enough.

Transitioning to real book shelves is both costly and difficult. Print-On-Demand service help lower the barrier to entry, but there are layout, proofing, and printing costs. Once physical books are produced, marketing the title to different bookstores and reviewers are not insignificant costs. We have the determination, but the capital is hurting.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Ricky's new to America and does not have a lot of friends yet. He's met many fun and interesting people during his travels, but he doesn't have a card or contact book (no pockets and needs to travel light), so help him spread the word by...

  • Volunteering your expertise...know a book publisher, create webpages, familiar in the graphic arts? We can use your help
  • Forwarding this campaign to your friends, family, acquaintances, enemies...really anyone
  • Liking Ricky Raccoon on Facebook and make it a game to share that link with 100 people

Ebook to real book - Work with the Publish on Demand services to transition from the current iBook format to real, paperback media...to make something real

Distribution - Even the greatest idea is meaningless if no one knows about it, so marketing and distributing the book will be the next step after publication

Website - Ricky's got wisdom and style, but that takes money to translate into a website. On this budget, it will still be a modest website for certain, but better than what we could learn in a reasonable amount of time
 
The Impact
A few inspired, hard-working people can only take a project so far. Nights/weekends freely given, monetary investments of what we could...but that's not quite enough.
Transitioning to real book shelves is both costly and difficult. Print-On-Demand service help lower the barrier to entry, but there are layout, proofing, and printing costs. Once physical books are produced, marketing the title to different bookstores and reviewers are not insignificant costs. We have the determination, but the capital is hurting.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Ricky's new to America and does not have a lot of friends yet. He's met many fun and interesting people during his travels, but he doesn't have a card or contact book (no pockets and needs to travel light), so help him spread the word by...

Volunteering your expertise...know a book publisher, create webpages, familiar in the graphic arts? We can use your help
Forwarding this campaign to your friends, family, acquaintances, enemies...really anyone
Liking Ricky Raccoon on Facebook and make it a game to share that link with 100 people

story:
In conjunction with the Champions League series between Canadian champions, Whitecaps, and Honduran champions, Olimpia, Vancouver Armada is raising funds for orphaned children in Honduras.

La Finca de los Niños orphanage is located just outside the Honduran capital of Tegucigalpa, and has been providing shelter, food, clothing and education to orphaned children since 1969.

The kids desperately require basics, such as clothing, toiletries (toothbrushes, etc) and toys.

In October, 2015, members of Vancouver Armada will travel to Tegucigalpa and deliver the donations to the orphanage.

Any donation amount is greatly appreciated!

Other ways to help:

If you are unable to assist monetarily, please share the link to this page on facebook and twitter. Spreading the word helps immensely!

Comments or questions? Send us an email: VancouverArmada@gmail.com

Thank you for your support. Sincerely,

Vancouver Armada

story:
¿Qué?

Tupperworld es una antología de relatos de ciencia ficción, de exquisito bouquet.

Te invito a degustar el futuro. Destápalo. Te esperan ocho relatos claustrofóbicos envasados al vacío para que los leas a cualquier hora. Todos elaborados con un ingrediente común a punto de caducar: el planeta tierra. Pero cocinada en cada relato de forma distinta. Hay para todos los gustos. Historias dulces, saladas, agrías y crudas para los que buscan sentir con cada bocado. ¿A qué sabe un mundo sin pasado? ¿Y uno en silencio que vive bajo el toque de queda del susurro? ¿Prefieres la cocina fusión?

Prueba la Tierra con una pizca de planeta vertedero. Para los sibaritas recomiendo el planeta dominado por el gran chef. Y como postre, nada mejor que una reunión de vecinos en un bloque de una ciudad pastilla.

Elije; el mañana se acaba.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Patricia Haro, aunque vamos a dejar que sea ella quien hable un poco de sí misma.

Nací en Sevilla en 1968 pero enseguida me mudé a la provincia de Málaga. Desde bien pequeña me fascinaban dos cosas; El cajón del botiquín y las libretas a rayas. Por eso estudié medicina y en cuanto pude sostener una pluma, empecé a diseccionar hojas y hojas para tratar de descubrir qué esconde ese mundo entre las líneas en el que sigo inmersa. Vivo en Barcelona. He escrito la antología Objetos y animales. ¡Menuda vida! (Ediciones Oblicuas 2014). En los últimos años mis relatos y mis poesías han sido publicados en quince colecciones y además he obtenido diversos premios en concursos a destacar.

En prosa, primer premio del XXII concurso de prosa, Los molinos. Ganadora del I concurso de relatos a la carta, Ediciones Saldubia. Primer premio del V certamen Arvikis-Dragonfly microrrelatos de cine. Mención especial primer concurso Editorial Letradepalo. Y en poesía, ganadora I antología internacional de poesía. Asociación de Estudios Universitarios de Galicia 2013. Segunda clasificada certamen de poesía de Tamariu 2015.

Patricia Haro te sorprenderá.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Tupperworld, futuros para llevar que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Patricia Haro vea publicada su obra. 

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
You've been stuck in a Zoom window. It's time to BREAK OUT.

 

The Video-First Era will show you how to make remote work work by leveraging next generation video tools and strategies to beat Zoom fatigue, collaborate more effectively, deliver more engaging presentations, create content faster, and approach business with a video-first mindset.

Hi! I'm Patrick Frank! I'm an award-winning video producer and first time author. Over the past year, my corporate video business has changed dramatically, from filming on location every week, to hardly ever leaving my home office. During this time I started:

  • Helping clients turn everyday Zoom conversations into shareable videos for marketing and training.
  • Producing virtual events for large nonprofits that brought in more money than the in-person versions.
  • Testing dozens of new video communication apps and virtual event platforms with my team, my clients, and my friends to learn what Zoom 2.0 looks like.
  • Meeting other entrepreneurs and small business owners who successfully pivoted their pandemic-impacted businesses.
  • Interviewing entrepreneurs, teachers, doctors, speakers, coaches and others to learn how they're using video-first approaches to revolutionize business, healthcare, education, and even personal relationships.

 

By now you're comfortable with participating in video calls. You may be apprehensive, but I'm going to convince you to fully embrace the new video-first world. I wrote this book to introduce the tools and strategies that will help you succeed in the next decade of knowledge work. 

 

The Video-First Era will show you:

  • How to beat Zoom fatigue by eliminating meetings
  • How to grow your network by hosting and attending awesome virtual and hybrid events 
  • How to deliver amazing virtual presentations people will actually pay attention to
  • How to create trust-building content from everyday Zoom conversations
  • How to host engaging experiences for family, friends, and coworkers (no more lame virtual happy hours)
  • How video-first strategies are revolutionizing entire industries and what these trends means for your business

 

Whether you're part of a company or nonprofit looking to work smarter with your increasingly remote team, or you're a solopreneur looking to create engaging video content that doesn't require scripts or cameras, or you're a just a fantastic human being looking to better connect remotely with family and friends, The Video-First Era will show you how to utilize new video-first tools to improve communication and guarantee more productive and delightful connection.

 

How This Works & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. The mockups you see currently are just placeholders.
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (i.e. physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts to get maximum exposure when the book is released in late summer 2021.

 

My publishing & sales goals

This crowdfunding campaign is dedicated to helping me publish a valuable, professional, and actionable book! I've set up specific milestones to help fund the production of a paperback, hardcover, ebook, and audiobook:

  • When I pre-sell 120 copies (or $5,000) of my book, I can publish a paperback and ebook.
  • When I pre-sell 150 copies (or $6,000) of my book, I can also publish a hardcover edition.
  • When I pre-sell 200 copies (or $8,000) of my book, I can also produce an audiobook.

 

SWEET PERKS

I am offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

AND BONUSES!

In addition to Perks, I'm planning awesome content and experiences, such as:

  • A comprehensive list of all the apps and platforms mentioned in the book.
  • Invites to test the latest and greatest new apps and platforms with me.
  • One-on-one coaching sessions to help you start implementing video-first strategies in your life and your business.

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other ways you can help

Preordering through one of the tiers would mean a lot, but there are others things you can do to help me publish this book:

  • Post a message to your networks that you've pre-ordered my book.
  • Connect with me and share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Tag it with #videofirstera so I can boost your post.
  • Forward an email to a few people you think would enjoy this book.

 

Thanks for your support!
