story:
The Skinny

  • I am Saul Rip Hansen, the author of The Shendoa and Underworld Legacy Series.
  • After four years of work, I have completed my latest novel.
  • Getting this book to you is what this project is about. 
  • The last four years I have dedicated every spare moment to better learn the craft of storytelling. This project is important to me because I used this story to implement all the lessons I strove to learn to master this craft. That benefits you as a reader. How you ask? You get a highly entertaining story that hits all your favorite sweet spots like all good books do. I have slaved away on this one to get it just right. There are some magical spots in this one that surprised me, and if it can do that for the guy who wrote it, then I know it will for you as the reader.  

What's the Book About?

Where Has All The Magic Gone?

Imagine The Knights of The Round Table never completely disbanded. What if they created a brotherhood to withstand the test of time, to keep watch for any heirs of King Arthur, and protect them from the last surfacing echoes of evil still seeking to hunt them down? 

What if Merlin predicted the rise of a particular heir, and with this heir, prepared the way for a re-awakening of all the lost magic in the world?

What if the only way for Merlin to do this, was to plan a way to reincarnate at the same time as this one particular heir, to again act as a guide and friend to the house of Arthur Pendragon?

With all those parts in play, what evils have survived from the time of The Round Table, and why are they still interested in an Heir, and besides all that, where has all the magic gone?

Maybe it’s time it all came back.

Cover Copy

On the night a cosmic event collides with a thunderstorm in New York City, Zoey and her best friend Emyrus are on their way to a concert when the two girls are caught in the storm and struck by beams of light that burn strange emblems into the ground, initiating a change in both of them. 

Zoey and Emyrus begin to elicit abnormal abilities leading them on an adventure indicating they both have ties to King Arthur and the realm of Avalon. As magical influences begin to reach the two girls, ancient rivals begin to cross and double cross each other to get closer to Zoey and Emyrus in hopes of rediscovering the magical sword Excalibur. 

Driven by survival, both girls unwittingly tumble into a journey of self-discovery as they track down clues explaining what is happening to them, and the challenges they must face in order to regain control of their lives. 

At Its Heart  

The core of this story, is following the emotional development of Zoey as she deals with making sense of some undue unfairness that life has dealt to her, and having the reader witness her reactions and how she chooses to feel about her past, all wrapped up in an exponentially accelerating plot filled with magic and the highest of stakes, her own survival. 

I hope you join me in experiencing this remarkable story. I am excited to include you on the evolution of this series. Even I don’t know. Let’s see where it goes. 

If you feel strongly enough, you have everything here to do something about it. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • My goal is to make a minimum of $3,000. Where is that going? It is to get books out to you, and any additional money will be spent on marketing to get even more books out to you and people like you. 
  • I am going to write a sequel to this book, and probably at least two. Because I already know that, there are some perks that are crazy unique, but also super fun, that I believe you will find interesting, that no other author out there I am aware of is offering. Be sure to check them out. 
  • If I don't make my funding goal, I am not going to write the sequel! Just kidding, that would be ridiculous. Writer's write, painters paint. This is what I do. Even if I don't make my funding goal, I am still going to write the sequel. But what's cool, is that by helping me reach my goal, you will be involved in the evolution of this story until it is fully told, and that I can promise, will be interesting and intriguing to follow. 

The Impact: Why Backing This Project Will Make The World Better

  • By contributing to this project, you will help spread the good ideas that I have infused into my stories.
  • Because of an incredible conglomerate of rad people, both of my previous campaigns for the Shendoa and Underworld Legacy Series were fully funded, and over-funded even. My hope is to build on that remarkable community to spread good media and good stories by making them available to more people. The best way to make them available to more people, is to make people aware that the content is even there. That's what the marketing end will do.  
  • I will always write, and I will do my best to infuse stories with morality and believable depictions of good and bad, light and dark, so that the things that readers get out of them won't just be surface level, they'll read because they know every time they pick up one of my books, they'll find some real depth there. If there's one thing I can promise as an Author, then that's it. My stories will make you feel, make you think, and make you appreciate your own humanity. 

Risks & Challenges

There are risks and challenges of course, as in any endeavor. (Sigh), but at this point in my life, I just accept with gratitude that things always work out, and I would rather suffer now than later to make it so. 

  • During this unprecedented time, taking great care to make sure that rewards sent to backers are as sterilized as possible is our first priority. Doing all we can to make sure the welfare and protection of you and your family members is at the focus of our attention. We will be vigilant in being courteous to you and your health. 
  • Luckily there weren't any outstanding issues with either of the last campaigns, and we expect smooth sailing with this one as well. 
  • Whatever challenges arise, we will handle them one step at a time, and make sure that you are taken care of. We got your back. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I totally get that some people can't contribute, or may not be into this genre of book, but want to help in some way. Here's other ways you can lend a hand to the success of this project:

  • Please share this project on Facebook, or other social media, and tag someone you know is into this kind of thing. They'll think it's cool, I promise. 
  • Right here on Indiegogo, they have provided "share" tools to make posting this to your social media a one-click breeze.  

One Last Call To Action

Buy this book! Either for yourself or as a gift, someone you personally know will love it. There are a ton of super cool things that went into the making of this book, and by backing this project you will get all the updates that give all those cool insider behind-the-scenes stories that are both fascinating and inspiring. Join this community, you'll love it. 

In Case You Like Reading...

What resonates most is this...

Years ago, by complete chance, my dad ran into Sean Astin at the Seattle airport, Sean was on his way to visit his mom for her birthday, and my dad said, “I have a son who is writing a book, and it would mean the world to him if you called him.” I was eighteen, and was writing the last scene of my first completed manuscript when he called. This still blows my mind. He gave me his email address, and for the next three months, he personally coached me, teaching me the ins and outs of the writing industry, and how to prepare and package a story for representation. It was incredible, I still can’t believe he did that, and I will always be grateful to him for that. I admired Sean Astin before, but that made me pay more attention to his creative projects, and what he committed himself to. What I noticed, is that he has positioned himself as an advocate for good media. More than anything, I decided I wanted to emulate THAT. 

With this latest story, my hope was to write a hit, but my GOAL was to make good media, because the world needs it. So that is where I started. This was what my internal dialogue sounded like: "I’m writing a young adult novel, what challenges do young people face? Infusing story with value, how can I help young people win when pitted against those challenges?" That mindset controlled every word on the page. On the surface it entertains, but between the lines, there is depth, REAL depth, and that’s where the magic is. THAT’S what resonates. It’s providing little light bulb aha moments that ring for a while, and that’s what readers remember most. 

In deciding to write a modern take on the King Arthur legend, the first thing I did was dig up the oldest, most original versions of the story I could find, and used that as the basis for generating ideas, because the original is so rich. What I found in doing that, was that human nature hasn’t changed much in the last 1,500 years. The themes surrounding King Arthur are just as relevant now as ever. 

This story became a study, of the idea of owning your choices--REALLy owning them. In life, you have an endpoint or goal that becomes your expectation, but then circumstances and opportunities emerge which force you to make a choice you didn’t necessarily plan on, but based on the cards in your hand, you made a certain choice, you committed to a certain direction, which at different crossroads take you in a COMPLETELY different direction than where you thought you would be. And because the grass is greener on the other side, the temptation is to look back, and wonder how different things would be had you made a different choice. 

Writing this story, I wanted to end that temptation, that tendency to look back, and for almost the entire story, through several drafts and changes, I wrote that struggle into each of my character’s lives. Once that theme emerged, I connected some dots that hadn’t quite clicked for me, then I went back through the whole book and emphasized it deliberately, which made all the difference, for me personally, and for my characters. When writing a book, there are times that I brush away dust and uncover words that surprise me, and benefit me in my own personal life, and if that happens for me, then I know it will happen for the reader as well, and I get excited about the story. Because it has taken four years to write, this story has a high concentration of those moments. It was fun to write, and it’s fun to read. It’s an absolute blast, that picks up in momentum, and only gets faster and faster, all the way to the end.  

You want a good story, you want good media, then this one’s for you.

story:
Our Story

The basic but compelling concept for the book is to pair the 

children's hand-written rules strips with issue related postcards that 

kids created when urged to express themselves artistically about their parents divorce.


In week six of Children of Divorce & Changing Families' 8-week program, we do an exercise where the kids in our 10-12 year old peer group get the chance to write the Rules of Divorce. Rules they feel, if followed, would make post-divorce life less stressful. 


The rules they write privately are then shared with the class and the kids find relief and strength in the fact that many of their requests are the same.

 

After years of doing this and other exercises and watching the same issues come up time and time again I felt I had the elements to create a different kind of book on divorce. 


A book that empowers children and enlightens parents.


The book is now complete (sample page above) but we still need funds to print 200 copies in time for the Tucson Festival of Books.


Please click on the gallery button above for more book pages.

And to read my Huffington Post article, please click on the link below.

children's hand-written rules strips with issue related postcards that kids created when urged to express themselves artistically about their parents divorce.

The rules they write privately are then shared with the class and the kids find relief and strength in the fact that many of their requests are the same.
 
After years of doing this and other exercises and watching the same issues come up time and time again I felt I had the elements to create a different kind of book on divorce. 

A book that empowers children and enlightens parents.

The book is now complete (sample page above) but we still need funds to print 200 copies in time for the Tucson Festival of Books.

Please click on the gallery button above for more book pages.
And to read my Huffington Post article, please click on the link below.

story:
¿Qué?

Rospit y el lago de lágrimas verdes es una inspiradora historia que invita a ir más allá, pretendiendo romper con las barreras para aquellos con limitaciones de movilidad.

El libro trata de una maestra atípica que compra a un anticuario un reloj mágico que la trasporta a ella y a algunos de sus alumnos a Cronuss, un mundo atemporal en el que vivirán diversas aventuras. El hilo conductor de la historia se basa en la necesaria aceptación de las diferencias personales y en el desarrollo de las capacidades inherentes a cada uno.

El  reloj participa de la historia, pero es un objeto mudo, que siente, piensa, ve, escucha, acompaña, pero no tiene pies, ni manos ni puede realizar acciones motrices por si solo. Este punto de vista, además de ser un elemento pensado para facilitar la comprensión, pretende invitar a la reflexión de todos sobre las personas diferentes, en muchos casos con incapacidades que no les permiten moverse, pero que pueden participar de forma activa en la vida a través de sus pensamientos y de su enriquecimiento personal.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Rosi Castillo.

Natural de Ubrique (Cádiz), ha vivido en distintos puntos de la península por motivos laborales. Es Diplomada en Magisterio por la especialidad de Audición y Lenguaje (Universidad de Cádiz)  y Graduada en Educación Primaria por la Universidad de Valladolid. Lleva nueve años ejerciendo como funcionaria docente por su especialidad, asociada a la mejora y el desarrollo del lenguaje en niños con problemas, con los que empezó a trabajar  a los dieciséis años. Esta es sin lugar a dudas su gran pasión junto con la escritura.

Actualmente reside en la Comunidad Autónoma de Aragón, concretamente en Huesca, lugar por el que procesa un gran cariño.

Rosi Castillo os sorprenderá.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Rospit y el lago de lágrimas verdes que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Rosi Castillo vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
What is this campaign all about?

ALL CONTRIBUTORS LISTED ON DEDICATION PAGE, UNLESS YOU WISH TO REMAIN ANONYMOUS. 

Author Website

Hello there!

My name is Claudette Melanson, and I'm an Indie Author from Kitchener, Ontario. I've published two Young Adult novels, Rising Tide: Dark Innocence and Undertow: Death's Twilight. Both have won awards from Readers' Favorite and Rising Tide is also a Medalist winner in the 2015 New Apple Summer Ebook Awards.

One of my current projects is a children's book I'm working on with my illustrator, Rachel Montreuil, who did the covers for both Rising Tide and Undertow. Rachel is a very talented illustrator who is just beginning to build her career. You will definitely be helping to further her while helping me, and supporting the Arts--one aspect of life which makes it worth living.

                      


Rachel Montreuil             Rising Tide Cover              Undertow Cover

The costs associated with the amount of illustrations required for a children's book are significantly higher than one cover for a regular novel, and in order to publish the book, I find myself needing help with the costs associated, which go far beyond the funding required for a traditional book. With all the giveaways I back, plus paying all my own costs for an editor, cover artist, travel to conferences and stock of books, I barely make ends meet, much less turn a profit from any of my books published to date.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to Illustrate Butters Comes Home, the basic cost for the the inside pages will be $1150, a print run of hardback books will cost over $700, plus the cost of paperback books which will run about the same as the hardback books but yield 200 books. There will be marketing and travel costs to promote the book upwards of $2000, but I plan to cover as many of the costs myself, but desperately need help with the cost of creating the illustrations that will make up the bulk of the storybook. I will be covering the costs of the cover, title and end page myself, which will also run around $200.

I won't ask you to donate something for nothing. There are some unique perks you will receive for donating. Including copies of my other books, copies of the Butters book, even ebooks for life for all of my future publications. Please see the details for each donation amount on the right side of the page. 

Even if I don't reach my goal here, Butters Comes Home will still be published, just not as quickly as I hope it will. No matter the dollar amount raised, I will be grateful for any monies raised toward the project to put Butters story into the hands of children everywhere. Butters Comes Home is a story that means a lot to me, since it is largely true, excepting a few fantasy elements, and will also contain educational components about how to provide a pet bunny with the special needs they require that many first time owners aren't aware of. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to donate to the campaign, there are other ways to help! Please don't hesitate to use the share buttons below to let others know about the campaign. I would appreciate it more than you know! Thank you so much for taking the time to look at this page and share it with others so I can bring my dream of publishing my first children's book to life. 

To support the Thunderclap campaign click here: http://bit.ly/1KyIIo4  It's easy! In 5 seconds you can agree to post on Facebook, Twitter & Tumblr a post I've pre-written. Just click a few buttons and on Feb 26 a message about the campaign will be posted by my supporters. Thank you!

Personal Contributions - Donators who funded offline:

story:
VAŽNO!

Osim razglednice svaki od ponuđenih artikala u cijeni uključuje i knjigu! Bilo je nejasnoća pa naglašavam ovdje jer nažalost ne mogu mijenjati tekst u opisu artikla. 

 

Što je i kako je nastao ''Iran u prezentu''

 

Kažu da kad se jedna vrata zatvore da se druga otvore. Čini se da je 2020. godina za mene bila upravo takva jer mi je nenadano oslobodila vrijeme za nešto o čemu sam sanjao od trenutka kad sam se u Iran preselio, a to je da napišem knjigu. Knjiga ''Iran u prezentu'' je nastala kao posljedica želje da široj javnosti naših krajeva (knjiga je na hrvatskom jeziku) približim Iran, njegove ljude, povijesno i kulturološko nasljeđe i da sve to začinim vlastitim razmišljanjima koja sam razvio tijekom trogodišnjeg života u toj zanimljivoj zemlji. 

U knjizi pokušavam čitatelju prezentirati Iran sa željom da nauči nešto novo, da se zabavi pa čak i da možda promijeni neka ustaljena mišljenja nastala prilično jednostranom i nažalost vrlo negativnom portretizacijom u medijima. Iran nije crn kao što fotografije na Googleu nameću, on je tirkizan. U njemu žive krasni ljudi koji svoju povijest i nasljeđe nose s posebnim dostojanstvom te se kroz ovu knjigu trudim čitatelju predočiti upravo takav tirkizan Iran. 

Što je to tarof, kako izgledaju pustinjski krajolici, zašto je perzijski dizajn tako neodoljivo lijep, zašto smatram da je naša hrana ukusnija, zašto mislim da živim u jednom od najljepših gradova na svijetu i kako objašnjavam neke restrikcije ili kako definiram položaj žena u društvu - sve su to pitanja nekih od tema na koja se u knjizi trudim dati zanimljiv, poučan i koliko toliko nepristran odgovor.

 

Što želim?

 

Kako bih sam izdao knjigu potrebna mi je financijska pomoć. Cilj ove kampanje je postavljen na 6,000€ i taj bi mi iznos trebao biti dovoljan za pokrivanje troška kupovine artikala (perks), postotak koji Indiegogo platforma automatizmom uzima te dovoljan za uređivanje, dizajn i tisak knjige. Kako bih potaknuo interes za vašim sudjelovanjem u kampanji odlučio sam ponuditi raznovrsne artikle jer smatram da živim u zemlji prebogatoj jedinstvenom suvenirskom ponudom.

 

Artikli (perks)

 

Jako sam se potrudio izabrati zanimljive i prikladne artikle te za svaki od njih garantiram maksimalnu kvalitetu iza koje stoji i vrlo zanimljiva priča. Dapače, riječ je o nekim od najkvalitetnijih proizvoda na svijetu pa se nemojte čuditi ako u opisima artikala koristim superlativ ''naj'' jer to zaista jest. Evo nešto dodatnih objašnjenja i priča o nekim od artikala koji se nude.

 

STOLNJAK

Jedan od najvidljivijih suvenira na iranskim bazarima su stolnjaci rađeni galamkari tehnikom. Na pamučne tkanine se milimetarski precizno utiskuju motivi velikim drvenim ''štambiljom'' koji je povezan oko ruke galam majstora. U različitim bojama i raznolikim motivima na galamkari stolnjacima se uglavnom pronalaze tipični motivi ispirirani detaljima iz perzijskih vrtova, a to su cvijeće, slavuji, ribe, voda, čempresi i lopoči. Središte galamkari tradicije je grad Esfahan pa ne čudi da u ovoj kampanji ponuđeni stolnjaci dolaze upravo s esfahanskog bazara.

 

ŠAFRAN

Šafran je najskuplji začin na svijetu, a njegove najkvalitetnije niti dolaze iz iranskog Horasana. U Faribinom i mojem domu 3,5 grama šafrana traje otprilike dva mjeseca, a to znači da bi lako u nekom europskom domu mogao trajati dvoznamenkasti broj mjeseci. Kako bi ga koristili, a ne zaboravili u nekom nekorištenom kutku kuhinje oni koji kupe ovaj artikl pronaći će upute kako najbolje koristiti ovo crveno zlato. Šafran se koristi prvenstveno kako bi hrani i slasticama dao prekrasan miris i intenzivnu žutu boju, a kažu da ima i izražena antidepresivna svojstva. Vrijedna osmerokutna kutijica u kojoj se nalazi izrađena je hatam tehnikom koju detaljnije objašnjavam nešto niže u tekstu u dijelu koji predstavlja šahovsku i tavla ploču.

 

 

TIRKIZ

Sjećam se u djetinjstvu kako mi je najdraža boja bila žuta, no danas mi je to svakako tirkizna. Boja je to iranskih minareta, džamijskih kupola, pločica kraljevskih palača i pozadina uličnih natpisa. A boja je to i naslovnice ove knjige! Nejšaburski tirkiz poznat je diljem svijeta, a u ovom artiklu nudim srebrne narukvice i naušnice s kamenom iz nejšaburskog rudnika. Umirujuća boja ovog dragog kamena donosi sreću, mir i blagostanje, a uz njega se veže interesantna činjenica da se može i pokvariti, a tad se kaže da je tirkiz umro. A kad to tirkiz umire? Kad dođe u dodir s uljem ili mašću. Znači, ne dirati tirkiz neposredno nakon nanošenja kreme na ruke! Vrijedna kutijica za nakit u kojoj se nalaze narukvica i naušnice izrađena je hatam tehnikom koju detaljnije objašnjavam u sljedećem artiklu.

 

ŠAHOVSKA I TAVLA PLOČA

Šah je indijska igra koju su usavršili Perzijanci, a najstarija ploča za tavlu pronađena je upravo u Iranu te datira 5,000 godina unazad. Kad se spoji tradicija igranja šaha i tavle s vještim rukama majstora minijature i hatam tehnike dobije se nešto što svojom ljepotom čovjeka ne ostavlja ravnodušnim. Mjeseci detaljnog crtanja minijatura i ubacivanja hatam cvjetova u drvenu ploču čine ovu ploču pravim malim umjetničkim djelom na kojem se posebno cijeni svaki pali pijun ili matirani kralj. Minijature prikazuju perzijsku konjičku igru polo domaćeg naziva čogan, igru koju su perzijski kraljevi s terase svoje palače promatrali na velebnom esfahanskom trgu Nakš-e Džahanu. Potpis majstora minijature nalazi se sitno upisan u jednom od kutova ploče. Iako se na esfahanskom bazaru mogu pronaći šahovske figurice Osmanlija, križara i Kineza, ja sam odlučio iskoristiti povijesnu istinu te na suprotstavljene strane postaviti Perzijance i Grke pa netko može biti Kserks, a netko Leonida ili Temistoklo. Tehnika hatam označava slijepljene prutiće drva, mjedi i devine i kravlje kosti koji se vodoravno izrezuju u tanke listiće (cvjetove) te zatim mozaično ubacuju u željenu drvenu površinu. Hatam cvjetovi osnovica su ove šahovske ploče, ali i kutijica u kojima dolaze artikli šafrana i nakita tirkiza. Ploču dostavljam osobno u krugu od 100 km od Zagreba - vi skuhate kavu, a ja vas učim pravilima tavle te pričam priče o bogatom esfahanskom obrtništvu. Ako se adresa nalazi na više od 100 km od Zagreba sve ćemo to nakon poštanske dostave obaviti videopozivom preko Skypa ili WhatsAppa. 

 

HORASANSKI TEPIH

Kraljica svih iranskih suvenira, podloga svakog iranskog doma, san mnogih u inozemstvu i umjetnost koja traje već tisućama godina. Perzijski tepisi su s pravom najslavniji tepisi na svijetu i zasigurno bi u zapadnom svijetu bili puno prisutniji da kojim slučajem Iran nije pod ekonomskim sankcijama. Svaka provincija ima svoj tipičan dizajn, a s obzirom da mi je supruga Horasanka i da sam knjigu započeo pisati u malom horasanskom selu tijekom korona karantene, imao sam mogućnost detaljno proučiti lokalne tepihe te odabrati jedan od najboljih koji se nudi. Dimenzije su 1,5x2 metra te sadrži 30% svjetlucajuće svile u žutim, bijelim i tirkiznim nijansama što onda tepih čini drugačijim ovisno pod kojim se kutem gleda. Što je to šišanje tepiha? Naime, oko pamučne osnovice pletu se vuneni i svileni čvorići (ovaj ih tepih ima 90/cm2) koji s gornje strane ostavljaju nekoliko centimetara dugačke čuperke. Potvrda da je tepih nov i nekorišten je upravo činjenica da je imao čuperke i da je morao ići na ''šišanje'', a šišao ga je u Esfahanu osobno predsjednik udruge iranskih restauratora tepiha koji mi je potvrdio da se radi o prelijepom i vrhunskom primjerku. Dizajn ovog horasanskog tepiha se naziva rizmahi, sitna riba jer najčešći detalji su mu ribice koje kruže oko lopoča. Dakako, riječ je o motivu iz perzijskih vrtova u čijoj je sredini nerijetko bio bazen u kojem su plivale ribice. 

Horasanski tepih dostavljam osobno u krugu od 100 km od Zagreba - vi skuhate kavu, a ja vam pričam o detaljima tepiha dok se divimo mijenjajućim bojama njegove svile. Ako se adresa nalazi na više od 100 km od Zagreba sve ćemo to nakon poštanske dostave obaviti video pozivom preko Skypa ili WhatsAppa.

 

Kako možete pomoći?

Jasno, najveća pomoć je sudjelovanje kroz odabir nekih od artikala, no to ne znači da ne postoje i drugi načini za sudjelovanjem:

  • pratite moju Instagram stranicu na kojoj sam sramotno neaktivan, ali i Facebook stranicu na kojoj marljivo i redovito objavljujem fotografije i tekstualne crtice iz života u Iranu
  • Lajkajte, komentirajte i dijelite moje objave sa svojim prijateljima i pratiteljima
  • Podijelite linke ove kampanje na vlastitim društvenim mrežama
  • Kontaktirajte me s prijedlozima i sugestijama kako ovu kampanju učiniti vidljivijom i zanimljivijom

 

Velike zahvale svima već i samo na čitanju ovih redaka, a kamoli na svim drugim načinima kojima pomažete projekt ili me potičete da radim i stvaram!!!

P.S. Za sve upite stojim na raspolaganju - ivan.dogic@gmail.com

Kažu da kad se jedna vrata zatvore da se druga otvore. Čini se da je 2020. godina za mene bila upravo takva jer mi je nenadano oslobodila vrijeme za nešto o čemu sam sanjao od trenutka kad sam se u Iran preselio, a to je da napišem knjigu. Knjiga ''Iran u prezentu'' je nastala kao posljedica želje da široj javnosti naših krajeva (knjiga je na hrvatskom jeziku) približim Iran, njegove ljude, povijesno i kulturološko nasljeđe i da sve to začinim vlastitim razmišljanjima koja sam razvio tijekom trogodišnjeg života u toj zanimljivoj zemlji. 
U knjizi pokušavam čitatelju prezentirati Iran sa željom da nauči nešto novo, da se zabavi pa čak i da možda promijeni neka ustaljena mišljenja nastala prilično jednostranom i nažalost vrlo negativnom portretizacijom u medijima. Iran nije crn kao što fotografije na Googleu nameću, on je tirkizan. U njemu žive krasni ljudi koji svoju povijest i nasljeđe nose s posebnim dostojanstvom te se kroz ovu knjigu trudim čitatelju predočiti upravo takav tirkizan Iran. 
Što je to tarof, kako izgledaju pustinjski krajolici, zašto je perzijski dizajn tako neodoljivo lijep, zašto smatram da je naša hrana ukusnija, zašto mislim da živim u jednom od najljepših gradova na svijetu i kako objašnjavam neke restrikcije ili kako definiram položaj žena u društvu - sve su to pitanja nekih od tema na koja se u knjizi trudim dati zanimljiv, poučan i koliko toliko nepristran odgovor.
 

Što želim?
 
Kako bih sam izdao knjigu potrebna mi je financijska pomoć. Cilj ove kampanje je postavljen na 6,000€ i taj bi mi iznos trebao biti dovoljan za pokrivanje troška kupovine artikala (perks), postotak koji Indiegogo platforma automatizmom uzima te dovoljan za uređivanje, dizajn i tisak knjige. Kako bih potaknuo interes za vašim sudjelovanjem u kampanji odlučio sam ponuditi raznovrsne artikle jer smatram da živim u zemlji prebogatoj jedinstvenom suvenirskom ponudom.
 

Artikli (perks)
 
Jako sam se potrudio izabrati zanimljive i prikladne artikle te za svaki od njih garantiram maksimalnu kvalitetu iza koje stoji i vrlo zanimljiva priča. Dapače, riječ je o nekim od najkvalitetnijih proizvoda na svijetu pa se nemojte čuditi ako u opisima artikala koristim superlativ ''naj'' jer to zaista jest. Evo nešto dodatnih objašnjenja i priča o nekim od artikala koji se nude.
 
STOLNJAK 
Jedan od najvidljivijih suvenira na iranskim bazarima su stolnjaci rađeni galamkari tehnikom. Na pamučne tkanine se milimetarski precizno utiskuju motivi velikim drvenim ''štambiljom'' koji je povezan oko ruke galam majstora. U različitim bojama i raznolikim motivima na galamkari stolnjacima se uglavnom pronalaze tipični motivi ispirirani detaljima iz perzijskih vrtova, a to su cvijeće, slavuji, ribe, voda, čempresi i lopoči. Središte galamkari tradicije je grad Esfahan pa ne čudi da u ovoj kampanji ponuđeni stolnjaci dolaze upravo s esfahanskog bazara.


 
ŠAFRAN
Šafran je najskuplji začin na svijetu, a njegove najkvalitetnije niti dolaze iz iranskog Horasana. U Faribinom i mojem domu 3,5 grama šafrana traje otprilike dva mjeseca, a to znači da bi lako u nekom europskom domu mogao trajati dvoznamenkasti broj mjeseci. Kako bi ga koristili, a ne zaboravili u nekom nekorištenom kutku kuhinje oni koji kupe ovaj artikl pronaći će upute kako najbolje koristiti ovo crveno zlato. Šafran se koristi prvenstveno kako bi hrani i slasticama dao prekrasan miris i intenzivnu žutu boju, a kažu da ima i izražena antidepresivna svojstva. Vrijedna osmerokutna kutijica u kojoj se nalazi izrađena je hatam tehnikom koju detaljnije objašnjavam nešto niže u tekstu u dijelu koji predstavlja šahovsku i tavla ploču.
 
 
TIRKIZ
Sjećam se u djetinjstvu kako mi je najdraža boja bila žuta, no danas mi je to svakako tirkizna. Boja je to iranskih minareta, džamijskih kupola, pločica kraljevskih palača i pozadina uličnih natpisa. A boja je to i naslovnice ove knjige! Nejšaburski tirkiz poznat je diljem svijeta, a u ovom artiklu nudim srebrne narukvice i naušnice s kamenom iz nejšaburskog rudnika. Umirujuća boja ovog dragog kamena donosi sreću, mir i blagostanje, a uz njega se veže interesantna činjenica da se može i pokvariti, a tad se kaže da je tirkiz umro. A kad to tirkiz umire? Kad dođe u dodir s uljem ili mašću. Znači, ne dirati tirkiz neposredno nakon nanošenja kreme na ruke! Vrijedna kutijica za nakit u kojoj se nalaze narukvica i naušnice izrađena je hatam tehnikom koju detaljnije objašnjavam u sljedećem artiklu.

 
ŠAHOVSKA I TAVLA PLOČA
Šah je indijska igra koju su usavršili Perzijanci, a najstarija ploča za tavlu pronađena je upravo u Iranu te datira 5,000 godina unazad. Kad se spoji tradicija igranja šaha i tavle s vještim rukama majstora minijature i hatam tehnike dobije se nešto što svojom ljepotom čovjeka ne ostavlja ravnodušnim. Mjeseci detaljnog crtanja minijatura i ubacivanja hatam cvjetova u drvenu ploču čine ovu ploču pravim malim umjetničkim djelom na kojem se posebno cijeni svaki pali pijun ili matirani kralj. Minijature prikazuju perzijsku konjičku igru polo domaćeg naziva čogan, igru koju su perzijski kraljevi s terase svoje palače promatrali na velebnom esfahanskom trgu Nakš-e Džahanu. Potpis majstora minijature nalazi se sitno upisan u jednom od kutova ploče. Iako se na esfahanskom bazaru mogu pronaći šahovske figurice Osmanlija, križara i Kineza, ja sam odlučio iskoristiti povijesnu istinu te na suprotstavljene strane postaviti Perzijance i Grke pa netko može biti Kserks, a netko Leonida ili Temistoklo. Tehnika hatam označava slijepljene prutiće drva, mjedi i devine i kravlje kosti koji se vodoravno izrezuju u tanke listiće (cvjetove) te zatim mozaično ubacuju u željenu drvenu površinu. Hatam cvjetovi osnovica su ove šahovske ploče, ali i kutijica u kojima dolaze artikli šafrana i nakita tirkiza. Ploču dostavljam osobno u krugu od 100 km od Zagreba - vi skuhate kavu, a ja vas učim pravilima tavle te pričam priče o bogatom esfahanskom obrtništvu. Ako se adresa nalazi na više od 100 km od Zagreba sve ćemo to nakon poštanske dostave obaviti videopozivom preko Skypa ili WhatsAppa. 

 
HORASANSKI TEPIH
Kraljica svih iranskih suvenira, podloga svakog iranskog doma, san mnogih u inozemstvu i umjetnost koja traje već tisućama godina. Perzijski tepisi su s pravom najslavniji tepisi na svijetu i zasigurno bi u zapadnom svijetu bili puno prisutniji da kojim slučajem Iran nije pod ekonomskim sankcijama. Svaka provincija ima svoj tipičan dizajn, a s obzirom da mi je supruga Horasanka i da sam knjigu započeo pisati u malom horasanskom selu tijekom korona karantene, imao sam mogućnost detaljno proučiti lokalne tepihe te odabrati jedan od najboljih koji se nudi. Dimenzije su 1,5x2 metra te sadrži 30% svjetlucajuće svile u žutim, bijelim i tirkiznim nijansama što onda tepih čini drugačijim ovisno pod kojim se kutem gleda. Što je to šišanje tepiha? Naime, oko pamučne osnovice pletu se vuneni i svileni čvorići (ovaj ih tepih ima 90/cm2) koji s gornje strane ostavljaju nekoliko centimetara dugačke čuperke. Potvrda da je tepih nov i nekorišten je upravo činjenica da je imao čuperke i da je morao ići na ''šišanje'', a šišao ga je u Esfahanu osobno predsjednik udruge iranskih restauratora tepiha koji mi je potvrdio da se radi o prelijepom i vrhunskom primjerku. Dizajn ovog horasanskog tepiha se naziva rizmahi, sitna riba jer najčešći detalji su mu ribice koje kruže oko lopoča. Dakako, riječ je o motivu iz perzijskih vrtova u čijoj je sredini nerijetko bio bazen u kojem su plivale ribice. 


Horasanski tepih dostavljam osobno u krugu od 100 km od Zagreba - vi skuhate kavu, a ja vam pričam o detaljima tepiha dok se divimo mijenjajućim bojama njegove svile. Ako se adresa nalazi na više od 100 km od Zagreba sve ćemo to nakon poštanske dostave obaviti video pozivom preko Skypa ili WhatsAppa.
 
Kako možete pomoći?
Jasno, najveća pomoć je sudjelovanje kroz odabir nekih od artikala, no to ne znači da ne postoje i drugi načini za sudjelovanjem:

pratite moju Instagram stranicu na kojoj sam sramotno neaktivan, ali i Facebook stranicu na kojoj marljivo i redovito objavljujem fotografije i tekstualne crtice iz života u Iranu
Lajkajte, komentirajte i dijelite moje objave sa svojim prijateljima i pratiteljima
Podijelite linke ove kampanje na vlastitim društvenim mrežama
Kontaktirajte me s prijedlozima i sugestijama kako ovu kampanju učiniti vidljivijom i zanimljivijom

 
Velike zahvale svima već i samo na čitanju ovih redaka, a kamoli na svim drugim načinima kojima pomažete projekt ili me potičete da radim i stvaram!!!
P.S. Za sve upite stojim na raspolaganju - ivan.dogic@gmail.com

story:
Story of My Book

Expatting While Black explores what it means to be a Black American woman working internationally. Through living more broadly, Black American women are transforming themselves and the world.

My name is Nicole Lowery and I am the author of Expatting While Black. I wrote this book because I wanted to share my stories and the stories of other Black American women living interesting lives around the world. And to explore how these unique experiences offer opportunities for cross-cultural understanding, self-discovery, and extraordinary encounters!

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how race, gender, and nationality converge to shape the experiences of Black American women abroad. Through humor, straight-talk, and story-telling merged with practical advice, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for working across cultures. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you open yourself to becoming both a student of other cultures, a teacher of your culture, and to broaden your perspective of what Black womanhood can be.

In this book, you'll learn about embracing opportunity, being prepared but open to the unexpected, defying expectations, having amazing conversations without words, and more! You'll read stories delving into topics such as...

  • What happens when an old Albanian man wants to read your copy of ESSENCE magazine.
  • How it feels to have African colleagues try to figure out your origins
  • Interacting with people who have only seen Black women on TV
  • How having a U.S. passport abroad means that your host country colleagues see you as American first, regardless of race or gender.
You will love this book if you enjoy reading about others’ lives, are open to new experiences, and have imagined transplanting yourself to a new environment.

Expatting While Black is a nonfiction book that speaks to young women considering international careers, global professionals who want to learn more about the experiences of Black women colleagues, family members and friends who want a glimpse into overseas life, and anyone interested in examining perspectives different from their own.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!
 

About the Author

Nicole Lowery is a foreign affairs specialist with over 20 years of experience working in twenty countries on issues such as gender, democracy and governance, economic growth, and assessing foreign assistance programs.

Nicole wants to share her insights on what it means to be a Black American woman living and working internationally. She wants to expand the narrative of Black womanhood and broaden perspectives on what is possible.

In addition to travel, Nicole loves trying out new restaurants, testing new recipes, planning international itineraries for friends, providing unsolicited feminist critiques of movies and tv shows, and the constant battle-of-wills with her husky-mix fur baby.

For more information, you can connect with Nicole at nicoleloweryauthor@gmail.com, Instagram (@nuggets_from_niki), and on Facebook and LinkedIn.

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ExpattingwhileBlack and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your encouragement and support!

Sincerely,
Nicole

story:
Story of My Book

The Shuri Effect is a non-fiction book about Black women in STEM, why they are so under-represented and how we as Black women can fix that.

My name is Lauryn, and I am the author of The Shuri Effect. I wrote this book because it’s the book I wish I had read four years ago, before I began my degree in Mathematics. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the complex and layered reasons why there are so few Black women in STEM, the truly inspiring ways they have continued to be pioneers, and what we can do to change the situation. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement I have for the experiences of Black women and the gender-STEM gap. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you be a better ally or, if you’re a Black woman or girl, as an artefact that leaves you feeling validated and empowered. 

In this book, you'll learn about gendered and racial attitudes and how they both feed into the lived experiences of Black women. You'll hear stories such as.

  • The experiences of my over 30 interviewees who are Black women in the US, UK and across the African continent. 
  • How film screenings with relevant role models in Uganda were linked to test performance.
  • How watching a film with a Black, female protagonist was related to improved academic performance in Uganda.
  • What self-efficacy is and how we can build it.

You will love this book if you are interested in intersectional perspectives, creating real change and the day-to-day experiences of Black women.  

The Shuri Effect is a nonfiction book that speaks to Black women, STEM advocates and allies who want to look at who we call scientists and the role imperfect institutions play in a new way.
 

About The Book 


The book is written in 5 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction and chapters 1 to 4.
In this section, we set the stage. We myth-bust the poor explanations provided for the current representation of Black women in STEM, and explore micro-aggressions and privilege in depth. I talk about the day I met Dr. Kimberlee Crenshaw and she opened my eyes to intersectionality , a framework for understanding how aspects of our identity combine to create privilege and discrimination, as a tool to engage with my own experience and how I’ve learned to react to people silencing me.

Part 2 contains chapters 5 to 8.
Here, we explore the early years and how we fail young girls at the very beginning. We explore the impact of role models, stereotype threats and discover hidden figures. I also share the story of this book’s title-- what Shuri meant to me and represents for society at large. 

Part 3 contains chapters 9 to 12.
This section discusses further education. We explore the imperfect institutions and the burden of navigating them as a minority, imposter syndrome, and mental health and wellbeing. We point a spotlight at the reality of continued racist incidents at universities and colleges and what needs to be done to make education accessible and supportive. 

Part 4 contains chapters 13 to 15.
Here we discuss employment—whether in academia or industry—and how that impacts innovation. I tell you why I think the 2016 film Hidden Figures is a wonderful analogy for imperfect Diversity and Inclusion schemes.

Part 5 contains chapter 16 and the conclusion.
To close the book, I share a manifesto for the bold, talented Black women who continue to blaze their own trails and a meditation on the advancements we have made and why we can all be hopeful and proud of the progress made. 
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Summer.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author


Lauryn Mwale is in her final year at the University of Edinburgh, majoring in Mathematics. She is a serial volunteer who is currently involved with Luvyum - a food sustainability start-up - YWCA Scotland, the WEF Global Shapers Community, and AIESEC. She is also developing a social enterprise to help close the gender STEM gap for Black women. 

As her university experience came to a close, Lauryn reflected on her own journey as a Black woman in STEM and the larger structures and systems at play. This book is the very book she wishes she had read years ago. She is passionate about intersectional feminism, ethical journalism, sustainable development and youth leadership. This book is one part of her larger goal to support the development of an equitable society. She is infinitely curious and always falling into online deep dives. 

Lauryn is obsessed with film essays on YouTube, skincare, and spending more time watching Tik Toks than she should. Ask her for a book recommendation! She loves reading. Her goal for her twenties is to travel to forty countries, which she hopes to do when the COVID-19 restrictions have been lifted.

For more information, or if you just want to have a chat ;), you can connect with Lauryn at lauryn.mwale3@gmail.com. 
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #The ShuriEffect and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Lauryn
story_txt:
Story of My Book
The Shuri Effect is a non-fiction book about Black women in STEM, why they are so under-represented and how we as Black women can fix that.My name is Lauryn, and I am the author of The Shuri Effect. I wrote this book because it’s the book I wish I had read four years ago, before I began my degree in Mathematics. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the complex and layered reasons why there are so few Black women in STEM, the truly inspiring ways they have continued to be pioneers, and what we can do to change the situation. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement I have for the experiences of Black women and the gender-STEM gap. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you be a better ally or, if you’re a Black woman or girl, as an artefact that leaves you feeling validated and empowered. In this book, you'll learn about gendered and racial attitudes and how they both feed into the lived experiences of Black women. You'll hear stories such as.

The experiences of my over 30 interviewees who are Black women in the US, UK and across the African continent. 
How film screenings with relevant role models in Uganda were linked to test performance.
How watching a film with a Black, female protagonist was related to improved academic performance in Uganda.
What self-efficacy is and how we can build it.

You will love this book if you are interested in intersectional perspectives, creating real change and the day-to-day experiences of Black women.  The Shuri Effect is a nonfiction book that speaks to Black women, STEM advocates and allies who want to look at who we call scientists and the role imperfect institutions play in a new way. 
About The Book 
The book is written in 5 parts.Part 1 contains the introduction and chapters 1 to 4.In this section, we set the stage. We myth-bust the poor explanations provided for the current representation of Black women in STEM, and explore micro-aggressions and privilege in depth. I talk about the day I met Dr. Kimberlee Crenshaw and she opened my eyes to intersectionality , a framework for understanding how aspects of our identity combine to create privilege and discrimination, as a tool to engage with my own experience and how I’ve learned to react to people silencing me.Part 2 contains chapters 5 to 8.Here, we explore the early years and how we fail young girls at the very beginning. We explore the impact of role models, stereotype threats and discover hidden figures. I also share the story of this book’s title-- what Shuri meant to me and represents for society at large. Part 3 contains chapters 9 to 12.This section discusses further education. We explore the imperfect institutions and the burden of navigating them as a minority, imposter syndrome, and mental health and wellbeing. We point a spotlight at the reality of continued racist incidents at universities and colleges and what needs to be done to make education accessible and supportive. Part 4 contains chapters 13 to 15.Here we discuss employment—whether in academia or industry—and how that impacts innovation. I tell you why I think the 2016 film Hidden Figures is a wonderful analogy for imperfect Diversity and Inclusion schemes.Part 5 contains chapter 16 and the conclusion.To close the book, I share a manifesto for the bold, talented Black women who continue to blaze their own trails and a meditation on the advancements we have made and why we can all be hopeful and proud of the progress made.  
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more!

 
About the Author
Lauryn Mwale is in her final year at the University of Edinburgh, majoring in Mathematics. She is a serial volunteer who is currently involved with Luvyum - a food sustainability start-up - YWCA Scotland, the WEF Global Shapers Community, and AIESEC. She is also developing a social enterprise to help close the gender STEM gap for Black women. As her university experience came to a close, Lauryn reflected on her own journey as a Black woman in STEM and the larger structures and systems at play. This book is the very book she wishes she had read years ago. She is passionate about intersectional feminism, ethical journalism, sustainable development and youth leadership. This book is one part of her larger goal to support the development of an equitable society. She is infinitely curious and always falling into online deep dives. Lauryn is obsessed with film essays on YouTube, skincare, and spending more time watching Tik Toks than she should. Ask her for a book recommendation! She loves reading. Her goal for her twenties is to travel to forty countries, which she hopes to do when the COVID-19 restrictions have been lifted.For more information, or if you just want to have a chat ;), you can connect with Lauryn at lauryn.mwale3@gmail.com.  
International Preorders
For international preorders, please send me a private message. 
Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Lauryn

My name is Irma Kaye Sawyer and my first non-fiction book, "Cosmic Keys and Light on the Path," is in editing stages and will be good to go by Summer of 2013.

story:
Hi Everyone!  My name is Sue.  I have been given the wonderful opportunity to have a new Service Dog Partner!  His name is "Elliot" and he is from the American Service Dog Association.  His trainer and owner is Susanne Schenberg.  Elliot is also a Yellow Lab.  I'm a great fan of Labradors!  They are wonderful dogs.   Elliot will allow me to continue to live my life independently.  I would hate to have to miss out on this wonderful dog and opportunity by not having the funds for him! 

The cost of my new Partner is $6,000.00 and we started with a $1,000.00 donation from a very generous supporter!  We currently have $2931.00 on Indiegogo and a little more than a month to go.  I am so grateful to you all for your generous donations!

For the past 11 years I have been blessed to have another American Service
Dog Association Service Dog.  He is an amazing Yellow Lab named "Droopy".  Today - October 6th, is Droopy's 12th Birthday and though it saddens my heart, he has more than earned his retirement.  Droopy has been with me, in recovery rooms, hospital rooms, PT rooms and every single step I have taken in my life for 11 years!  He has truly been my guardian angel.  His retirement years will be spent with me in my home.  He recently told me that his retirement plans are to monitor his Facebook page, to watch Ellen DeGeneres dance every day, and to watch all of his favorite TV shows!  So I'm including two photos of him training for retirement.  I hope you enjoy them.

I have spine and right leg damage from an accident, I am a Bi-lateral
Mastectomy Survivor.  Several years ago we found that I have a disease called
MCTD (Mixed Connective Tissue Disease) and then I developed several other
auto-immune diseases.  I have a total of 8 diagnosis'.  There are times when I
have to use a manual wheelchair and a walker.  When I first met Droopy I spent
95% of my time in my wheelchair.  After several surgeries, and with many hours,
years really, of physical and lymphedema therapy - I am able to spend 95% of my
time walking with my Service Dog Partner!  I want you to know that without the amazing training of my Service Dog I would not be living as successfully as I do. I am forever grateful to Rob and Susanne Schenberg from the American Service Dog Association. 

I have gone back to college, been an Interpreter For The Deaf - not realizing that I would be losing some of my hearing, and now I use an Interpreter for occasions like funerals, meetings, courtrooms, etc.  I read captioning for movies and TV. 
Droopy has learned to alert me to thunder storm sirens, fire alarms, people calling me from somewhere else in the home and the doorbell.  He has saved my life more times than I can count! 

Thirty years ago I was a Veterinary Tech and that training has helped me to be a good Partner to my Service Dog.  I've been a waitress, a cook and dishwasher at a grill, a Church janitor and I worked on a street department. After my injury, I was a teacher assistant with plans to get my teaching degree.  Unfortunately that dream was not realized, and then my health got worse.  Now, when my health allows it, I volunteer in a local Kindergarten Class.  

Droopy and I have volunteered for 11 years on "Disability Day" in several
school districts where I speak to the students about being a Service Dog
Partner.  Droopy and I are now in our 4th year of volunteering in the same local Kindergarten classroom!  The children learn that even though I have many disAbilities that I can still read and write and be a useful member of our society.  They learn that Service Dogs are working dogs and that they too are productive members of society!  I am so grateful to the Principal and the Teachers for giving us this amazing opportunity.  There are many weeks when I can't show up because of my own health issues, or the flu may be going around the school and because of my immune system I cannot volunteer, but we do our best to show up every time we can.  We also go to Boy and Girl Scout Meetings, Churches, Synagogues, Men and Women's Groups to speak about Service Dogs and The Rights of DisAbled Americans.  Invite us and we will gladly come to educate and meet your group!  Volunteering feeds your soul and I recommend that everyone do it! 

I have incredible friends and supporters because Droopy has brought so many people into my life.  I hope that you will be willing to help me achieve my goal of my
next Service Dog.  Their training is extensive and Elliot is learning how to work specifically with me.  Our trainer Susanne believes that we can be a perfect match for each other! 

I'm on Social Security Disability and I don't have a pension.  I have no family that can help me or live with me.  I'm doing my best to stay independent, to keep my home  and to stay out of the nursing home system.  And the best way for me to succeed at this is to get a Service Dog Partner and to ask you for your generous help.  Any funds that we receive over the $5,000.00 that is required for my new Service Dog will go towards future veterinary care, and if we are really Blessed - a very much needed new roof and a central air unit so that we can remain in our home and stay independent.  Thank You for helping me! 

I hope that you'll join our Team, tell all your friends and help us to move forward successfully! 


All Our Best, Sue and Droopy (soon Elliot too!)

story:
The deadline is August 20th. We need to sell 500 books to get a green light for this project to go ahead. Next stop after that? Bestseller, of course!

About This Project

BlueBeary and Kathleen went on a big adventure to Toronto where they pitched to the Dragons in CBC-TV's Dragons' Den. It was a great experience and they learned a lot. Now we are ready for the next adventure.

After falling in love with BlueBeary through BlueBeary and Samantha's First Story, many of our fans are eager for another adventure with him.

This next adventure is A Very BlueBeary Christmas. Grandpa comes to visit, but BlueBeary is missing. Samantha wants to take Grandpa and BlueBeary to school for a Show-and-Tell story. What will she do without her little friend?

Help Us Build Momentum

Did you know that a book becomes a bestseller in Canada at 5000 copies sold? As we plan the next book, our goal is to make it a bestseller. We want to be in at least 5000 homes, classrooms and libraries. How many copies can we sell before we start production in July? 500 is 10% of our goal. 1000 copies makes 20% ... Will you help us do it? See the perks on the right-hand side.
 
Help us build sales momentum for completing the Show-and-Tell series, in which Samantha must find a new story to share with her class every month. A Very BlueBeary Christmas is the second book in the series. We intend to publish a total of twelve books in this series, all focused on teaching children to tell excellent stories.
 
To kick off this bestseller, we are offering free shipping on advance sales, as well as some limited edition opportunities. Here are the levels (read descriptions on the right-hand side):
 
$5         Art cards
$15       Book of choice + tote
$35       Set of three books + tote
$50       5 books + tote
$100     10 books + tote
$100     Limited Edition Hardcover (5 available)
$250     Sponsor a School or Library
$500     Name Grandpa
$500     Model a Character (3 available)

Spread the Cheer

• Tell your friends and make some noise about these books and perks before August 20th. Copy and paste this link: www.indiegogo.com/bluebearychristmas.

 • Follow us on Facebook and Twitter.

• Get other people to follow us on Facebook and Twitter.

• Sign up for the Open Eyes Books newsletter at www.openeyes.ca.

About Kathleen McMillan

Teacher by day, writer by night, Kathleen has been educating children and telling artful stories for two and a half decades. She is credentialed in Early Childhood Education, has written four children’s books (with several more ready in the wings), and is a popular speaker at schools, conferences, and fairs.

Kathleen says the scariest and most challenging thing she has done in her life so far is facing the fire in CBC-TV's "Dragons' Den"! Watch our website for news about an airing date for the fall season: www.openeyes.ca. 

The Show-and-Tell Series

Each book in the series corresponds to a month of the school year. Every month, Samantha must decide on a story to share in Show-and-Tell at her school. Her special friend BlueBeary is her helper for every adventure. All of the books include a Note to Teachers and Parents plus a discussion guide ("Starting the Great Conversation"). 

The first release from Open Eyes Books is BlueBeary, a pre-cursor to the Show-and-Tell series. BlueBeary is also available as a read-a-long iPhone app from PicPocket Books.

An interactive fourth book from Open Eyes Books is The Story of a Story, available as an ebook. Sign up for the newsletter to get it for free!

story:
About Me

Hello, my name is Jordin Crow.  I am a Freshman at Arkansas State University and a member of Central Baptist Church in Jonesboro, AR.  Before college, I was raised by my wonderful parents and church in Hope, AR.  

Why Canada

I have been in multiple Mission Projects before this year, but they were all in my price range.  Because the cost for the Canada Mission Project is so high, I hesitated to sign up.  A day after the deadline, a friend talked to me and told me that he is raising about $6,000 to go to China.  He stated that he has total faith in God that He will provide.  He also said that the college years are the best years to be in a Mission Project because of the flexibility.

Very soon after talking to him, I got a text from a member of CBC stating they have one more spot open for someone to go and immediately, I said I will. I truly believe that God wants me to go on this project.

Calgary is the fastest growing city in Canada with the youngest population. Over 100,000 are university students, most of whom do not know Christ. There are few evangelical churches in the city and there is a need to start urban churches that would reach young adults, among others. 

In Canada

The mission of this team will be to help the Church Planting Catalyst for Alberta determine opportunities to plant churches to reach young adults in the universities and downtown Calgary. The team will be at SAIT, University of Calgary, Bow Valley College and University of Alberta (downtown Calgary campus) sharing Christ, prayer walking, doing spiritual surveys, praying with people and meeting persons of peace. 

Our team would be the first team to scout the city of Calgary in recent years. We are expecting God to open doors, minds and hearts to the gospel! Our team will lay the foundation for many mission groups and church planters from different churches who will come and build on our efforts.

There will also be a day where the team will go snow skiing.

The Impact

This project is very important to me for two reasons: To see other college students come to know our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, and to grow in Christ and come to love Him more and more as I serve him missionaly.

Your contributions will greatly impact the peoples' lives in Canada.  Through giving, you will be a part of something far greater than just me or CBC.  You will be a part of advancing the Kingdom of God and seeing lives come to know and love Jesus.  

 

The Goal & What You Get

My goal is $900.  With giving you will receive a letter via email March 25th showing all the results with pictures.  Soon after that, you will recive a video about the trip made by yours truly! Most importantly, I truly believe God will bless you for your generous gift.  (Philippians 4:14-20)

I have made a bank acount that holds all the money given to me for my mission funds.  Your money will go straight to that account.  I will personaly write down all the records of the acount.  If the money goes over the goal, I will save that money for future Mission Projects.

This website charges a 4% fee if I make the goal and 9% if I don't.  You will not be charged for it, only I will. 

You have my word that I will use the money strictly for Missions.

 

Pray, Pray, Pray

Even if you can't give, I ask you to pray and to put this mission trip on the top of your prayer list.  Pray for me, pray for the team, pray for Calgary, Canada, pray for the people there, pray for the church plants, and pray for souls to be saved and people to know and love the God we love.  Prayer is very very powerful!  So above all, I ask you to pray!

Thank you very much for your time and support!  I thank God for this opportunity that I have and may he bless you!
